string.original: While freeing Sonja from The Gloom, I missed Yvette, who kept a brave face against Faugrimms' Beasties! She is the one! {denug}
I don’t know how you can stand battling the Gloom Lord and his minions day in and day out. Me? I could use a dashing prince to help me get through it. Do you happen to know any?
It was TOTALLY boring in the Gloom. You're an absolute DOLL for rescuing me! We're gonna have a blast!
We have stuck together this long,you and I... Join me in my Adventure Club, and we will be ready to defeat Senor Shadow!
Could you help save my childhood home from the Gloom? The cottage is near a river. Don't fall in!
I've got it! I'll go into the family business. Everyone loves a good fortune teller, right?
Someone is in need of rescuing from the Gloom. Explore here to see who!
Congratulations, this area has been added to your Kingdom. Share a free Exploration Crystal with your friends?
Hellooo, Izzy's in the Castle, and I'm ready to party! This is SO much better than being in the Gloom. Thanks for finding me!
The Gloom is too powerful here. Soon we will be able to push it away and expand our kingdom here!

Dearest Yvette - I hope this note finds you well. I can't reveal too much, but I've found something that could change everything. I've hidden it safely away. Do you remember the gift you'd leave for me every morning? Search there. -Love, Your Father
A Mysterious Note: Click to Read!

Yvette - I found a magical portal in a large circle of stones. My curiosity got the better of me, and I ventured through it. I discovered a world rich with treasure, and I brought one back for you. Remember your favorite food for lunch? Think about it and you'll find a clue to the treasure.
A Mysterious Note: Click to Read!

Yvette, you only need to look a little bit more, I promise. But this one may be a bit harder for you. Be brave and overcome your fear, and you'll find the hidden treasure. In the meantime, be careful. I fear something dark crept out of the portal and into our world.
A Mysterious Note: Click to Read!

Yvette, I hope you're the one who found this. And I hope you are safe. I fear what dangers the portal may bring. A dark smoke has started to seep out of it - covering the land and forming strange creatures. Someone or something evil is behind this. Take this golden egg and sell it. Use the coins to get as far away from here as you can. I must find out what is behind this darkness and try to put a stop to it. For you, sweetheart.

This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Accelerate Neighbor buildings or collect from them and earn rewards.
Saplings need to be watered several time to fully grow.
A true lover does not dwell overly on his beloved. He seeks to bring value to the world, and thus lure his love to him. Also works on puppies.
A woman's heart is no easy prize. You need kindness, strength, and willingness... to do chores.
My baking, not so good. But putting out fires, I’m an expert. May come in handy against the minions of Senor Shadow.
Love in the Time of Gloom: 3 of 10
Between carrying rocks and anvils, {player} is looking cut!
Get pumped up with this free Energy!
Help Rafael show off by crafting 1 Anvil for him to lug around.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Move 10 Rocks around to show off those muscles.
Click Design Mode and select Move to move objects.
Have 6 Dragon Scales to show that you are not afraid of overgrown lizards.
In the end, you and I, and maybe a few others, will stand together to save the Kingdom. What more could impress Yvette?
Yvette was not even watching?! I must find a way to impress her, so we can face off against Senor Shadow together... eh, holding hands. Hopefully.
Love in the Time of Gloom: 5 of 10
{player} helped Rafael with a little art project of love.
Here's some free Berries to make some blue ink!
Craft 1 Parchment for a portrait, to show Rafael's artistic side.
This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market..
Have 1 Bottle of Ink for the portrait.
This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Feed Adult Peacocks to gather Feathers.
Now that the chores are done, I have noticed there is such drear because of the Gloom. Painting a portrait of fair Yvette is sure to dispel it!
I'm a fool to think Yvette's beauty could be captured on canvas! So I painted... a goblin in a wig.
Love in the Time of Gloom: 4 of 10
{player} is taking it up a notch.
{player} showed the Beasties who's boss and wants to share rewards with you!
Flex your muscle and collect some Coins!
Visit Neighbors and do activities in the Kingdom to earn Reputation Hearts.
Tax Rafael's houses 5 times, to show his responsibility.
When a house is ready, click on it to tax them.
Clobber 1 Beastie in 5 different Neighbors' Kingdoms.
Visit 5 different Neighbors and Clobber 1 Beastie in each of their Kingdoms.
Yvette cares not for showy things like rubies or peacocks. In times like these, men of honor are needed.
Your word is worth more than gold! Yvette has agreed to be wooed! Woohoo!
Love in the Time of Gloom: 7 of 10
{player} is helping keep his people in royal bling.
Get some Royal Jewels to keep your Kingdom blingin' too!
Have 3 Rubies, for jewelry, to show generosity.
Silver Ore comes from collecting from Mines.
Visit Neighbors to perform various activities.
I have wooed many a lady. Many. But none of my professions of love work like they did with the others. The many others.
I now realize showing my muscle was wrong. Actions speak more than a thousand gifts. Unless those gifts involve ending the Gloom. Or jewelry.
The peacock, it has swallowed the necklace! I have elected not to wait for it to, um, reappear.
Love in the Time of Gloom: 6 of 10
{player} is helping Rafael craft some Chocolate Bars in CastleVille.
Craft your own love bites with some free Coins.
Collect from 5 Bakeries in Neighbors' Kingdoms. Well, the good bakeries.
Visit Neighboring Kingdoms and Collect from their buildings.
Craft 1 Chocolate Bar for Rafael to woo Yvette.
This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen and bakery. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have 15 Berries for Rafael to feed to Yvette.
Tending flowers will give you berries.
My date with Yvette, it must be perfect ! Will you help me prepare, my friend?
Ah, these berries! They are almost as sweet as Yvette. Now, for the date!
Love in the Time of Gloom: 8 of 10
{player} just experienced the stuff of fairytales and wants to share the fun with you!
Get your fairytale and collect some Energy now!
Look for others in need of rescuing in the Gloom. Well, at least 2 times.
You must have Exploration Crystals, Coins and specific Castle Levels to explore.
Such beauty! But I can't woo Yvette when Gloom threatens our world. Let us take steps to end it forever, my friend.
The Gloom will fall, but until then, I must say goodbye to Yvette. Fate may reunite us.
Love in the Time of Gloom: 10 of 10
{player} is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!
Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!
Buy 3 Torches to see at night
Buy torches from the Decoration section of the Market.
Clear 10 things so there are less things to hide behind
Clear grasses, flowers, or tree stumps
Something was creeping outside my house last night. I couldn't see it, but I- I'm not scared.
It came back last night! I couldn't tell what it was, it avoided the light.

Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!
Craft 2 Animal Treats for the Count to count

Get Pails of Water from fishing

Visit Neighbors where you are part of their building crew and tend that building
Vampires like to count things. Help me get some Animal Treats and it'll get stuck till dawn!
No Animal Treats and no vampire! It must be the most powerful vampire ever!
{player} is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!
Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!
Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Oat crops you need.

Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Oat crops you need.
Don't think it's a vampire? We'll test it by leaving something boring out, like Oats.
Wow! The Oats are gone, too! No vampire would want Oats. Unless it's vegetarian.
{player} is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!
Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!

Harvest the Cotton from farms or Trade Neighbors for it

I'm going hunting for whatever is stumbling around at night. Um... could you help me make torches?
I saw it! Sort of. It was big. I followed it, but it had longer legs than me. I bet it's an Ogre!
{player} is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!
Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!
Have 25 Honey to tempt the ogre
Get Honey from clearing flowers. Plant more from the Market, if you run out.
Get Berries from clearing grasses. Plant more Grasses from the Market, if you run out.
If this ogre likes Oats, it'll love something sweet! When it comes, I'll rush out with my sword!
The sweets are gone? But I didn't see the monster. I only closed my eyes for a second, I promise!
{player} is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!
Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!
Have 10 Flour Sacks to make a cast
Craft Flour Sacks in the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for it
Get Pails of Water by fishing
Search Neighboring forests for signs of more footprints, Chop 20 trees
I found a huge footprint, see? Let's make a cast of it and show it to Alastair!
Alastair says the monster is a giant. I bet it's a one-eyed giant looking for its missing eye!
{player} is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!
Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!
Craft Fried Fish once you have a Kitchen
Have 6 Hard-Boiled Eggs. They do feel like eye balls!
Craft Hard-Boiled Eggs in the Kitchen or Trade with Friends
Eggs and fish. The giant will think the eggs are its eye. And the fish, well, you'll see!
The giant ate the eggs! I guess it isn't missing an eye. But now we can smell its fish-breath!
{player} is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!
Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!
Have a Bakery and Craft a Chocolate Bar

Visit 10 Neighbors looking for the ogre giant
Click a Neighbor from the Neighbor bar below to visit them
We should bait a trap for when the smelly one-eyed ogre giant comes looking to eat our eyes!
I'll just test that chocolate to make sure it will do the job.
Did I say soothe? I meant smash!
Get smashing and grab some free Coins!
Use 1 Rat Potion to summon one of The Woeful Wizard's nasty Gloom Rats.
Buy in the Market or craft it in the Kitchen, then use it in your Inventory.
Earn rewards like crafting materials by banishing Beasties.
Gather 3 additional Crystal Shards by Banishing Beasties or asking your friends.
Banish Beasties to gather Crystal Shards. You can also ask your friends for them.
We've got our treasure-hunting equipment. Now we need to banish some of Old Gloomy's Beasties!
Ha! Those Beasties don't know what hit 'em. Now we've got the shards we need to explore the murky mists!
{player} has got all the equipment they need for treasure hunting!
Get equipped too with a Free Shovel!
After my shipwreck, I hid some treasure chests around your Kingdom. But now they're lost in the Gloom! If you get your hands on my booty, I'll share it with you!
Buy 1 Shovel to dig up the Treasure Chest.
Buy 1 Shovel from the Decor section of the Market.
Buy 1 Barrel from the Decor section of the Market.
Have 5 Spyglasses to search for treasure.
I'm glad you're aboard! First things first - we'll need some treasure-hunting equipment!
With equipment like yours, my chest is as good as plundered! Rafael will be so jealous.
{player} is crafting Exploration Crystals and has Crystal Shards to share!
Grab a Crystal Shard so you can craft and explore, too!
Craft 1 Exploration Crystal to dispel the Gloom.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Collect Coins 5 times from Neighbors' Kingdoms' houses.
Visit Neighboring Kingdoms and collect Coins from their houses.
Collect 1000 Coins so you can explore!
Collect taxes and sell items or tend animals and crops to get Coins.

With these crystals, you can dispel the murk hiding my treasure!

Grab some Coins to fortify your Kingdom today!
Place 4 Stone Walls to protect the Kingdom from the forces of evil.

Place 4 Moats to form a barrier.
Buy Moats from the Nature, Water tab of the Market.
Visit 3 neighboring Kingdoms to check out their fortifications.
From your Neighbor Bar, Visit Neighbors' Kingdoms.

Hope those fortifications are enough to keep the Beasties out. They're sneaky blighters!
{player} found Sonja's treasure chest and has loot to share!
Get to clickin' below before all the Coins are gone!
Explore to find Sonja's Treasure Chest. It's hidden by dragon bones to scare Thieves away!

Collect Gloom Wolf Hair for 3 Beastie decoys

Have 2 Royal Jewels for the decoy Beasties' eyes.

Aye, you know how to get your hands on some booty! Have you done this before?
{player} pulled Sonja's treasure chest from the mud and has loot to share!
Grab some Pails of Water and tell {player} to clean up their act.
Have 5 Rope to haul the Treasure Chest out of the mud.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have 1 Cow to use as a counterweight.
Have the Rope and Cow first, then click to open the Treasure Chest.
Arrgh! My treasure chest is stuck in the mud. Get some Rope - I'll keep an eye out for Beasties!
Whew! That was tough work, but the chest is mine. I mean, ours!
Must be Sonja's Bubbly Grog. It's good stuff!
Raise your glass and get free Bubbly Grog from {player}!
Have 2 Flasks to hold Sonja's best grog.
Go Fishing in neighboring Kingdoms to relax. Fish 5 Times.
Visit Neighbors and click their ponds to catch fish.
Sell the Cow. She knows too much!
Use the Sell option in the Designer Tools to sell items.
The only thing better than grog is gold. Let's open up that chest!
Now that we've got the chest, we can relax. But sell the Cow...she knows too much!
Aye, that's better. You've got to know when to relax… and when to sell Cows that know too much!
{player} is searching for lost loot and has plenty of Coins to share.
Get moving and collect your Coins by clicking below!
Have 2 Hammers to break the lock on the chest.

Have 5 Dragon Scales. They might be tough enough to break the lock!
Have the Hammers and Dragon Scales, then click to open the Treasure Chest.
Arrgh! I can't find the key to the chest. We'll have to break the lock!
The blasted lock won't break! We've got to get this chest open before more Beasties show up!
Down with Gloom, up with bloom!
{player} is restoring life to their Kingdom in CastleVille!
Join the fight and grab some Coins!
Buy in the Nature, Plants section of the Market.
Feed 3 Animals, keep your creatures healthy!
Click on hungry animals to feed them.
Clear 2 Rocks in your Kingdom to prevent Yvette's toe from getting stubbed.
Clear a rock by mining it until it's gone! As easy as that.
We have to bring life back to the forest, before the Gloom wins! Down with Gloom, up with bloom!
My anti-Gloom slogan is catching on! This is much better than my first idea - wearing a meat dress.
The bunnies in {player}'s Kingdom are perfectly happy away from the Gloom!
Hop on over and grab a Carrot. Your bunnies are jealous!
Plant 14 Carrots. They're wort their weight in Coins!
Place Farm Plots to grow Crops.
Have 14 Carrots to feed the bunnies.
Click Fully grown Crops to Harvest them.
Give love to your Neighbors' crops, too! Accelerate a crop in 1 Neighbor's Kingdom
Visit a Neighbor and Accelerate 1 crop in their Kingdom
A slogan isn't enough. Animals are stuck in the Gloom! Like bunnies. Won't you help the bunnies?
Whatever the Gloom is, it makes bunnies hungry! We can't stop now. The whispy woe is everywhere!
{player} is raising Chickens to fight the Gloom!
Pluck up your courage and grab some Coins!
Feed 4 Chickens, there is nothing sadder than a hungry Chicken!
Buy in the Animals tab in the Nature section of the Market. Click to feed Chickens when they are hungry.
Place Farm Plots to grow Crops.
Nothing says down with Gloom more than bringing more life to the Kingdom! Let's do it!
Down with Gloom, up with Chickens? I'll work on it.
{player}'s Chickens are happy enough to dispel the Gloom. Well, almost.
Get cluckin' and grab some Eggs.
Place Farm Plots to grow Crops.
Your Neighbors' animals could use some love, too! Feed 8 Chickens in Neighboring Kingdoms.
Click Neighbors' hungry Chickens to feed them.
I haven't come up with a Chicken slogan, but there is a Chicken dance. Feed them and you'll see!
Did you see the Chicken dance? How can anyone be Gloomy after that? Um, besides the Beasties.
{player} is raising Cows to fight the Gloom!
Moo-ve on over and grab some Coins!
Buy in the Nature, Animals tab of the Market
Have 20 Wheat to feed your animals.
Place Farm Plots to grow Wheat Crops
I was so sure those happy Chickens would vanish the Gloom. We need more life! Lots of cute life!
Aww, they're so cute! I'm calling that one Gus. How's that for happy?
{player} won't be cowed by the Gloom!
{player} is keeping their herd safe from the forces of evil!
Grab some Gloom-free Milk to celebrate!
Have 8 Wooden Fences to keep the animals safe.
You can Craft Wooden Fences if you own a Worshop or buy in the Decor tab of the Market.
Click Design Mode to move Objects.
Your Neighbors' Animals could use some love, too! Feed 1 Cow in 2 different Neighbors' Kingdoms.
Visit 2 different Neighbors and feed 1 Cow in each of their Kingdoms. Click Neighbor Cows when they are hungry to Feed them.
I can't -huff- catch Gus -huff. Our Cows are going to run right into the Gloom!
Whew! That was close. Poor Gus was almost Gloomy!
{player} is looking out for our fine feathered friends and has Coins to share!
Flap on over and grab some Coins!
Buy from the Nature tab of the Market.
Buy in the Decor tab of the Market.
Buy Saplings from the Nature tab of the Market.
Our fences created a Gloom-free haven for all, from the birds to...Oh. Forgot the birds.
Now it's a safe haven for all... except for the poor Beasties!
{player} is giving the Beasties a second chance!
Grab a Crystal Shard and spare a Beastie!
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Craft an Iron Axe in the Workshop. Sell items from your Inventory.
Craft in a Workshop then sell from your Inventory.
If we show the Beasties some love, maybe they'll stop being so Gloomy!
Take THAT, Gloom! I'll rehabilitate all the Beasties, just you watch.
{player} is showing the Beasties some love!
They're not the most cuddly of creatures, but Beaties have feelings, too! I think.
Grab some Reputation and spread the love!
Let 2 Beasties live in your Kingdom.
Perform activities in your Kingdom to attract Beasties or use a Beastie Potion.
Buy 1 Keep Off Sign to protect the Beasties from visitors.
Buy in the Decor tab of the Market.
We can make a little home for the Beasties right here, out of the Gloom. Won't that be nice?
Now that they're out of the shadow, I'm sure the Beasties will cheer up!
My, what big teeth you have!
Watch out, {player}'s Beastie is a bit... bitey.
Grab some Mystery Meat and RUN!
Keep the 2 beasties safe a bit longer. They may just be hungry...
Perform activities in your Kingdom to attract Beasties
Move 5 Animals away from the Beasties.
Click Design Mode to move Objects
Get 4 Mystery Meat to feed the hungry Beasties.
Eek! One of the Beasties nearly ate Gus! They must be reaaallly hungry. Let's feed them!
Ow, ow, OW! That Beastie bit me! I guess it doesn't like Mystery Meat, either!
{player}'s Kingdom is full of life. Take that, Gloom!
Grab a Red Tulip while it's in bloom!
Rearm the Kingdom, Craft 3 Wooden Clubs.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Banish the 2 Beasties. Gus will be happy!
Click on Beasties to Banish them.
Alastair says that Beasties are minions of the Gloom Lord! I hate to say it, but they've got to go!
Never mind the Beasties, look how much life we've restored! Down with Gloom! Up with bloom!
Explore to Find Tom in the Gloom
Explore Gloomy areas to reveal Tom's location

Good day to ye! My name is Sir Thomas, but you can call me Tom. You MUST need some help if you've come calling for an old knight like me. I warn ye, it will take a lot more than swords to deal with the menace you're facing. But you're young, and ye look like you have a good head on yer shoulders. I'll share the wisdom of my years with ye. And if me back holds out, I may help with a fight or two.
Give Tom a new Sword as a sign of good faith
Click on Tom to give him a sword
There is a magical cave that will help us on our quest to dispel the Gloom. Who better to assist with a quest than a knight?
Tom is a noble knight always ready for adventure. I'm sure he will help you!
{player} is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!
Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!
Have 6 Ropes to catch the ogre giant
Craft Ropes at the Workshop or Trade with neighbors

I think I pulled the rope too soon. My mother usually did this part.
Build up your strength by moving things in your kingdom.
Click on a tree to chop it.
Energy potions can be purchased in the Market and drunk from your inventory.
So, you're lookin' for a cave? There's far worse than Beasties in the depths of the earth. You'll need some trainin'.
Feelin' any stronger? I hope so. That's all the trainin' we've got time for!
{player} is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!
Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!

Select a new area not far from where Baz was a tree

Click on the map area to explore the Crystal Cave
Click on Goblins to banish them
Aye, the cave you're lookin' for is nearby. Explore just a wee bit farther!

Click on the Dragon to attack it
Dragons are fierce, but we've got the element of surprise on our side. CHARGE!
Well... that could've gone better. Looks like we need a new plan!
Fish to get Pails of Water
Click on the Dragon to dowse it with water
That dragon will roast us to a crisp unless we find a way to block its fire. Got any ideas?

Click on Chickens to acquire Eggs
Have 1 Stone - Throw Eggs at the Dragon
Click on the Dragon to pelt it with eggs
EMBER: Oh please help me find my egg!
Dragons are prideful creatures. Pelt it with eggs - that'll draw it out of the cave!
Bless my beard! Never in my years have I seen a dragon cry. How very strange!
{player} is looking for a few good men!
{player} is helping Yvette catch a prince and receiving Reputation points in return.
Celebrate {player}'s match-making skills with some extra Reputation.
Clear 7 grass to help Giseele find a frog to kiss.
Fish 10 times in a neighbor's kindgom to try and catch a frog.
Click on the a Pond to fish from it.
Collect 15 honey to help make the kiss less gross.
Do you know how to find a prince? I've heard that kissing frogs can work. Let's get it over with.
Yeeuck! Tastes like flies. But with that honey, it might catch on.
Yvette is sleeping soundly thanks to a whack on the head from {player}.
Take advantage of the situation and get some free XP.
Have 1 Cotton Cloth for Yvette's bed sheets.
You must have a Studio and a Tailor to Craft this item. Purchase Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have 1 Wood Club, to knock Yvette out. This is gonna hurt!
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have 2 Love Letters so Yvette can send them to a prince.
One prince wants to wake his love with a kiss. Let's give it a go! I'll just need a sleeping aid.
(Yawwn) No prince came by? Oh bother, and now I have a splitting headache!
Note to self: Don't use real fish scales to make a mermaid costume.
Hose Yvette and {player} down with a free Pail of Water.
Collect 15 Bass for a mermaid costume. No fish were harmed in the making of this costume.
Collect 2 Shells to make a bikini top. I hear they are all the rage this season.
Have 4 Royal Jewels for Yvette's mermaid costume.
My mother was a siren. Maybe I can disguise myself as a mermaid and enchant a prince with song.
Peew! It's hard to charm anyone when you smell like dead trout! I need to go take a bath.
{player} is helping Yvette find a prince using her Beastie brand hair extensions.
You can wig out too with some free Wolf Hair.
Own a second Maiden's Tower for Yvette to hang her hair out of.
Click on the Market to buy a Maiden's Tower.
Have 7 Gloom Wolf Hair so Yvette can have REALLY long hair.
Have 2 Dye Kits so Yvette's roots aren't showing.
This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Who wouldn’t rescue a damsel in distress? I’ll lock myself in a tower. And I’ll get hair extensions.
Ow, ow, ow. Have you ever let someone climb your hair? It HURTS.
Spinning gold seemed so easy in the fairy tale!
{player} and Yvette have been trying to spin straw into gold.
Use some free Alchemist Powder to craft some gold the easy way!
Tax 1 Building in 3 Unique neighbor's kingdoms to discover the man's name.
Visit neighbor's and look for the coin indicator above houses.
Have a Tailor so Yvette has somewhere to work.

Have 20 Wheat Bundles to spin into gold.
Place Farm Plots to grow Crops.
Some creepy little man will teach me to spin straw into gold if I can guess his name. Can you Help?
I think all I spun this straw into is a bad case of hay fever – achoo!
{player} thinks little of Yvette's new roommates.
Yvette has been shacked up with seven miners who won't stop singing!
Stuff your ears with free Cotton Material to drown out their songs!
Buy in the Resources tab of the Buildings section of the Market.
Collect from a Mining Camp 3 Times.
Click on the Mining Camp to harvest it.
Have 1 Iron Pick so the short miners can work.
You must have a Workshop and a Blacksmith for this craft. Purchase Crafting buildings in the Market.
A magic mirror suggested I could meet a prince if I moved in with some short miners.
Let's never speak of this again. Those little guys were creepy! And all they had to eat were poison apples.
Ouch! You try dancing in those things!
Yvette left her glass slipper at the ball and {player} carried her all the way home!
In return, {player} has some extra XP to share.
Have 2 Cotton Cloth for a Gown. Yvette needs a new dress anyway.
You must have a Studio and a Tailor for this craft. Purchase Crafting buildings in the Market.
Collect 8 Sand to make a glass slipper for Yvette's slipper scheme
Visit 1 Friend's Kingdom to take Yvette to the ball.
Click on the Neighbor Bar to Visit.
A nearby kingdom is throwing a ball! What say I show up and “accidentally” leave behind a slipper?
Oh my aching feet! Now I know why people leave glass slippers at a dance.
Yvette's been getting unwanted attention from wolves. Maybe red's not her color?
{player} saved her and has some Energy to share.
Have 1 Thief Cloak to venture into the woods with.
Banish Thieves to find Thief Cloaks.
Have 25 Tomatoes to color the cloak red and guard against skunks.
Place Farm Plots to grow Crops.
Have 5 Mystery Meat so Yvette has something to take to Grannie.
I'm running some goodies into the forest to attract Gloom Wolves - and a brave prince. So don't interfere!
A dozen wolf attacks and not a single rescue! Maybe I should look for a dog instead of a prince.
Explore to find the Dragon Egg in the Gloom
Click on the map area to explore and find the Dragon Egg
Click on Thieves to banish them

With all those Thieves, this must be the right place!
{player} is looking for loot in CastleVille!
There's just one problem. Sonja's treasure chest may be a little bit… cursed!
Grab some Coins before the curse strikes!
Are you ready for another treasure hunt? Of course you are!
Craft 3 Iron Picks to break the lock.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop and Blacksmith. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Buy 1 Shovel to dig up treasure. This could get dirty - just the way I like it!

Craft 1 Rope to haul the chest.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Before we set off, let's gather some supplies. We'll be moving a lot of rocks so come prepared.
Aye, I'm expecting trouble with this chest. I stole it from a witch, and she had the nerve to put a curse on it!
Sonja's Cursed Treasure Chest doesn't stand a chance!
You might want to grab some Coins now. Just in case.
I still can't find my key! Have 10 Animal Bones for skeleton key.
Banish Beasties to gather Animal Bones.
Have 1 Tend Here Sign so Neighbors will take care of things while we're gone.
Buy from the Town tab of the Decor section in the Market.
Have 3 Eyes of Newt to give Alastair so he'll lend a book on curses.
Ask Friends for Eyes of Newt.

The gas was everywhere! It's horrible! I took the treasure and ran for it! And I need a bath.

Craft a Chef's Salad to detox George
Craft a Chef Salad in the Kitchen
Fiber, that should help George! Click on Empty Farm Plots and grow the number of Oats needed or Trade with neighbors

Uh oh. I shouldn't have had the milk, too. It doesn't always agree with me!
Give a Chocolate Bar to George as a gift
Craft a Chocolate Bar in the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors. Click on George to offer the gift
George is the stink monster, just like he was the ogre! Maybe this will turn him back to normal.
A real monster? I can't believe it! A real monster?
Can always use an extra axe! Craft a Iron Axe in the Workshop
Have 6 Bundles of Arrows to take care of any danger
Craft Bundles of Arrows in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors
Have 3 Hot Buns *in case of snack attack
Craft Hot Buns in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
Much better! I owe Baz a real monster. Think my picks are enough to keep him safe?
It's been awhile since I held an arrow, but we'll need it if the dragon attacks! Oops! Spoiler!
Have 5 Buttercream Icing for smearing on Baz's shield
Craft Buttercream Icing in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
These smell almost as bad as the Stink-Monster! Gather Ogre's Belch from clearing grasses
George says coating my shield will make it fireproof! From what? I-I'm not scared at all!
It's a dragon! I'm not afraid of dragons! I'm Baz, dragon-slayer!
Explore to the Dragons home territory
Select the territory with Dragon bones and explore there
Here there be dragons. If we don't find them, they might find us!
I think Baz was a little relieved the dragon was gone. So was I! But we're ready for the next one.
With your Great Hall completed, you can explore the land! Search for Wizard Alastair, who will help you gain your Crown!
Click on a Gloomy Area to explore
Excellent! Now that you have explored, you're closer to locating Alastair. Find him, and he'll help you earn your crown!
You've uncovered Alastair's satchel. He must be close! Keep exploring and find Alastair!
LOC ERROR dbid2868_caption: Unmatched brackets! (caption:{player:[player.firstName] ] is cleansing the Lamont Swamp of Gloom and wants to share the rewards!})
Put on your galoshes and stomp through the swamp for these rewards!
Explore the source of the Slimy River
Select a new area along the Slimy River to Explore and disperse the Gloom
Have 8 Spyglasses to inspect the area
Request a Neighbor to send you the Spyglasses you need
We need to see the source of this foul disease on the land. Explore deeper into the Lamont Swamp.
So, this is the infamous Lamont Tree. It is as mighty as it is frightening. It still must be destroyed.

Click the Neighbor Bar to Visit the Duke's Kingdom
Thank goodness you've come! There's a filthy beastie right over there!

You need more production to support a larger population, Your Majesty.
These Lumber Camps shall be providing logs for construction very soon, mark me words.

Click on Lumber Camps to collect logs
Buy in the Decorations tab of the Market
Idle Lumber Camps are nae good to anyone.

Craft Hot Buns in the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for them

These Hot Buns are a tasty treat. Not oat cakes, mind you, but still tasty.
Click on a Mill to collect Flour

We feel richer now, your Majesty, with steady a supply of grain.
Craft Animal Treats in the Kitchen or trade with neighbors

Those animals love that feed, your Majesty, that they do.

Let's test the fishing in these ponds and streams.
You ask how is the fishing good around here? I say it is quite good, indeed.
Click on Sheep when the are hungry to feed them

Visit neighbors and strengthen our relationships through trade.Click on the neighbor bar to visit other kingdoms
It's my advice, your Majesty, that in this world, one cannot have too many friends.
{player} is the Adventure Club's first member!
{player} joined Rafael's Adventure Club and is ready for adventure, love, and treasure!
Enjoy the spoils of adventure with some free Coins!
Pay the one time $2,500 non-refundable enrollment fee.
With your membership fee, you will receive 1 special button!
Mail in 5 Proof-Of-Banishings. Thief Cloaks Only.
Banish Gloom Thieves to find Thief Cloaks.
You seek adventure? Join my Adventure Club! Even though we fight Gloom, we can still have fun!
You are the finest member of the Adventure Club. And also the first. Sonja thought I was joking.
Izzy's moved in to {kingdomName}. It's party time!
Better stock up on Coins so you can party through the night.
Move Izadora's Wagon into your Kingdom.

Change your Character's Outfit to fit the new fall fashion!
Customize your Character any way you see fit.
Have Flower Boxes to make your kingdom more beautiful.
Buy the Flower Box from the Nature tab in the Market.
My wagon is mobile, but it's AWFULLY heavy. Can you help me move in?
Your kingdom looks FABULOUS. This is going to be PERFECT! Thanks, babe!
You can never have too much color in your garden!
{player} took Izzy's advice and spruced up {kingdomName}.
Grab some leftover flowers! Hurry before they wilt!

Visit Neighbors and click on flowers to smell them.
Buy 6 Flowers to add a splash of color to your Kingdom.
Have 7 Regal Hoes to tend your new garden.
You really fixed up this place. Old Gloom and Doom must be so mad! Now you just need some COLOR!
I always say you can never have too much color. Let's turn that Gloom to GLAM, whaddaya say?
Izzy went to town and on {player}'s dime no less.
Celebrate the spending spree with some XP.
Get with the latest style. Buy a shirt.
Buy a new shirt in the Market
Do you like this shirt? I ADORE it. So Fab!
Those pants are so yesterday. Buy a new pair.
Buy a new pair of pants in the Market.
Everyone looks better in a new hat. Buy one.
Buy a new hat from the Market.
I'm all settled in my -- er, YOUR -- Kingdom. Let's check out the best part of any Kingdom - the MARKET!
That was so much FUN! I just love shopping day! Now, where to put all this stuff…
{player} hooked Izzy up with her two new Gal Pals, Sonja and Yvette.

Have 2 Bubbly Grog for Sonja. She does like her drink!

Buy animals from the market and feed them.
Have 5 pretty Fairy Wings to give to the gal pals.
No more shopping to do. I'm BORED. What I need is a BEST FRIEND! But who? Sonja or Yvette?
Aw, Sonja and Yvette are both so sweet! I'll just have to have TWO besties!
{player} is all Play and no Work…
At least when fun-lovin' Izzy is involved.
Bask in the light of some gold Coins… they're Izzy's favorite color!
Visit Neighbors 5 times to plan Izzy's trip.

Prep for the trip by performing 25 Neighbor Actions.
Perform 25 Actions in a Neighbor's Kingdom
Your Kingdom is way comfier than the cold Gloom, but I am SO ready for a VACATION! Will you help me plan my trip?
Alright, we've looked around enough… I've got my trip all planned out. It's gonna be AWESOME!

Have some Mystery Meat to lure your own mink!

Gather 10 Eggs to feed the Mink
Craft 1 Bedding for Izzy's new pet.

My vacation spot was so exclusive that I got lonely. I know! I need a pet I can take EVERYWHERE!
Isn't she PRECIOUS!?! She's just the cutest thing in the Kingdom! I think I'll call her... Minkerbelle.

There are some nasty rumors going around in CastleVille which are TOTES not true!

With this disguise, no one will recognize - er, CONFUSE - me with the girl in those drawings!
Izzy's parents cut her off, but will she learn her lesson?
Help her learn a lesson by taking a free Gold Brick from her!
Izzy could use a loan. Sell 10 Items.

{player} is enjoying adventure in its purest form… battling Beasties!
They're so good at it, they have extra XP for you!

Have 10 Gloom Goblin Ears... then wash hands.
Clobber 1 Beastie in 10 different Neighbors' Kingdoms.
Visit 10 different Neighbors and Clobber 1 Beastie in each of their Kingdoms.

Goblins. Filthy little things. Like children. But we must get a little dirty to go against the Beasties of Senor Shadow.
Please help and banish that beastie!
Oh, thank you! And what luck, you've earned a Reputation heart. You should visit some of my buildings and animals to try and earn more!
{player} put on some dancing shoes and is a dancing machine!
Spread the fever and collect some Reputation!
Have 5 Regal Hoes to stand in as dancing partners.

Craft Practice Dummies in the Studio, or buy Practice Dummies at the Market.
You are so willing to adventure! Ahem, excuse me, you've brought a tear to my eye. Ok, it is gone. Let's adventure some more!
Hunting. Fire Eating. What could be next? Now is the time that we dance my friend. Will you test your dancing shoes?
You are prepared for adventure on the battlefield, or the dance floor! But the Gloom, she may ask more!
{player} 's mouth is on fire and is sharing some Milk to cool it off!

An adventurer must demonstrate the power of mind over matter... fire eating! Please, help me prepare!
Ah, oo, ee! I believe it is enough that I did it. I do not regret a thing. Well, not true, maybe tomorrow I will.
{player} is on top of the world!
{player} climbed a mountain just because it was there!

You balk at nothing! Senor Shadow and his Beasties will tremble! How was the mountain? Could you see my house from there?
{player} saved some creatures from a fire and is burning to share rewards.
Only you can prevent house fires... with a Free Pail of Water!

Sell 6 Mink Oil, that stuff is flamable my friend.
Feed Adult Minks to get Mink Oil, then sell them from your Inventory.
A brave adventurer you are! We will put Senor Shadow and his Gloom to shame, and also the man who said I'd never amount to anything: my barber. Let's continue my friend.
Adventurers fight Gloom not just for glory. Sometimes it's to save minks from burning buildings. It is true.
Well done! In the Great Yarn Fire, I saved 300 kittens. You are better off with the minks. Kittens, they scratch.
{player} is so cultured! Wouldn't you agree?
{player} is prepared to travel the globe to seek adventure with Rafael.
Luckily, you only have to click here to get some free XP.

Yes, with this, we will honor the Naral Tree people! They may hold the secret to defeating Senor Shadow and his Gloom. Or not. They talk to sticks, so who knows.
{player} is ready for a cold shower!
{player} has been getting frisky and is all hot and bothered about the rewards being shared!
Take a bath and collect your reward!

Buy 5 Sheep to act as stand-ins for polar bears.

Help out 1 time in 10 different Neighbors' Kingdoms.
Visit 10 different Neighbors and do activities 1 time in each of their Kingdoms.

Ah, the polar bear swim! Polar bears learned that from me. I get residuals every time they get wet. Which is more often than one would think.
Wolf Hair is so useful for creating a fake monster on short notice!
{player} faced what goes bump in the night and wants to share the reward!
Don't get scared -- collect some Wolf Hair to overcome your own fears!
Buy 5 Dead Trees to use as frames for our Beastie.

Have 15 Gloom Wolf Hair to put on the frame.

Haver 10 Fairy Wings. We can make them look scary later.

Don't be stinky! Take some free Ogre's Belch!

You look like you could use a makeover!
With Izzy's help, {player} is primped and ready to prowl.
Go from geek to chique with some XP.

{player} is still in the running to become CastleVille's next top model!

This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.

Craft a Catapult in Studio and place it in your Kingdom
Craft Rope or Trade with Friends
I've just had a great idea for my act: I'll shoot myself out of a catapult! Now I just need a catapult and some rope to make a net.
This trick is going to be a blast!
Gather Wood Logs from chopping trees
Acquire 1 Hammer to repair Antonio's roof
Craft Hammers or Trade with Friends
The catapult trick was a success! Well, it successfully shot me. Over the net and through Antonio's roof.
Thanks for helping me repair Antonio's roof. I don't want him mad at me. That guy carries an axe!
Be on your guard! Faugrimm has summoned creatures to raid your homes -- look over there!
Faugrimm's coin-hungry Thieves will raid your houses and residents, locking them down
Faugrimm's attacks are getting more bold. These theives are cunning and dangerous. Make haste in dispatching them!
What a fierce battle! Here take this potion to restore your strength. I'll show you how to better protect your kingdom.
Watch Towers are located in the Support tab of the Buildings section of the market
Collect Longbows from your Friends to properly equip your Watch Tower
Gather the materials needed and complete construction of the Watch Tower
The Watch Tower provides a strong defense against Beasties. Send the word out to all of your neighbors. To Arms!
Good Work! Those Theives must have been scouts for the attack. Use this Work Order get a head start crewing your new Tower.
Clearing out an open space around Watch Towers allows for more room to protect your most impoertant buildings
Gather Wanted Posters from your friends so the Tower Archers will recognize their targets
Remove obstructions near the Watch Tower for clear shooting. Check with your neighbors to see if they've noticed any suspicious individuals.
Marvelous, the Watch Tower is well placed to cover likely Beastie attacks. And the archers are well aware of their targets.
Ask Friends to Crew your Watch Tower
The more friends you have crewing your Tower, the more Arrows you'll get to battle Beasties
Supply 5 Friends' Watch Towers with Arrows
A Town Watch only works if everyone helps each other. Visit your Friends and take part in their Town Watch.
Watch Towers need a crew to stand guard. Friends can help each other with this. You'll also need to keep your tower stocked with arrows.
Excellent, the Watch Tower is in place. And not a moment to soon. Ready your arrows, the final attack is on its way!
Alert the Town Watch, Faugrimm is launching his attack! It's headed this way and it's a g-g-goblin!
Your new Watch Tower will automatically dispatch invading Beasties for you
The Duke has promised a special reward. Gather the materials to help him complete it.
Oh my, a Goblin! Worry not, with your new defenses you are well prepared for this attack. Afterward, gather a few supplies and I'll reward your efforts.
Brilliant! Faugrimm will certainly think twice before attacking again. Here, use this practice dummy to keep your Town Watch well trainded.
Acquire 1 Leather Pants to look good on the road
Craft Leather Pants in the Studio or Trade with neighbors
Craft Hard Boiled Eggs in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
Tom told me to hit the road. What a great idea - a traveling show! Of course, I'll need supplies.
With these supplies, I'm just about ready to take this show on the road!
Craft Jeweled Crown in the Studio or Trade with neighbors
Buy Pigs from the Animals tab in the Market
Harvest 5 Grapes to feed the Pig
Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Grape crops you need.
My traveling act needs some props. Can you find me a Jeweled Crown and a pig?
These will be perfect for my comedic interpretation of Hamlet!
Craft Flags in the Studio or Trade with neighbors
Craft Banners in the Studio or Trade with neighbors
Since I'm taking my show on the road, I'll need to advertise!
These flags and banners should attract an audience!
Click on Beasties to Banish Them
Before I start my trip, I want to be sure the road is safe. Could you banish some beasties for me?
Now I don't have to worry about beasties wondering if I taste as funny as I look!
Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of crops you need.
Animals will periodically be hunger, click animals with an arrow above them
While I'm packing for my trip, would you mind taking care of my crops and animals?
Wow, you actually did my chores for me! I should travel more often.
Craft Fried Fish in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
With the beasties gone, I can start my journey to the mountains. But I'll need supplies!
With these mountain supplies, I'm sure to be at peak performance!
Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Chili Pepper crops you need.
Craft Spicy Sausage in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
My mountain act rocked! But I've caught the Ch-Ch-Chilly Willies! Can you concoct a c-c-cure?
There's nothing better than a Spicy Sausage to cure the worst mountain maladies. On with the show!
Craft Horseshoes in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors
I'm feeling better, but some fresh air will do me good. I'm taking my show to the countryside!
These supplies should keep any problems from cropping up during my countryside performance!
Buy Sheep from the Market's Animals tab
The farmers loved my act! But I've got some baa-d news. I seem to have come down with the Ewe Flu!
The Ewe Flu had me feeling sheepish, but you didn't fleece me. I'm starting to feel better already!
Fish to acquire Buckets of Water
Craft Hot Buns in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
No more pulling wool for me. I'm off to the desert to perform my next comedy show!
The heat is on, but these supplies will get me to my desert performance, no sweat!
Craft Buttercream Icing in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
My desert show was the hottest yet! But now I've caught the dreaded Dune Bug!
Thanks to your cure, the Dune Bug didn't overcome my sunny disposition!
Chop Trees to gather 5 Wood Logs
Craft a Barrel in the Studio or Trade with neighbors
I've still got sand in my ears - and other places - but the show must go on. On a boat, that is!
These sea-faring supplies should see me safely to my next performance. Time to set sail!
Craft an Iron Pick in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors
Craft Bubbly Grogs in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
Ah, the ocean breeze, the hearty laughs of grog-soaked pirates… the Barnacle Bumps…
I was in over my head with the Barnacle Bumps, but now that I'm cured, things are going swimmingly!
Craft Meat Sandwiches in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
Craft Iron Axe in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors
My keel is ship-shape again, so it's time for my final show on the road. To the forest!
Now that I've got these forest supplies, I won't stick around. Thanks for rooting for me!
Craft Cotton Cloths in the Studio or Trade with neighbors
Acquire 1 Flaxseed Oil to cure Richard
Craft Faxseed Oil in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
Haha! My forest act left 'em pining for more! But they left me with something, too. Hardwood Fever!
My axe is polished and my fever has passed. I'm ready to put on my next show - in your Kingdom!
Have 1 Opera House in your Kingdom
Buy an Opera House from the Market's Castles/Buildings tab and build it
Harvest 10 Grapes for the crowd to enjoy
Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Grape crops you need.
Performing on the road was great practice. Your subjects are gonna laugh til they cry!
They laughed! They really laughed! And it this time, it was at my JOKES, not me!
Craft Rope in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors
Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Flax crops you need.
Tie me down! I need to practice knot-work before I return to sea.
These knots will hold even if it gets rough at sea. And knowing me, it will!
Craft Wood Planks in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors
Buy Water from the Decoration/Water tab in the Market
I've walked plenty of planks in my time, but I could stand to walk one more!
Walking the plank… now that takes me back!
Fish to get 1 Bucket of Water
Craft Wool Cloth in the Studio or Trade with neighbors
Swabbing the deck used to be one of my favorite passtimes.
Now that's a well-swabbed deck. I haven't lost my touch!
Chop Trees to get Wood Logs
Find me some Wood, and I'll raise a mast!
My mast-raising skills are renowned in every port!
Craft Leather in the Studio or Trade with neighbors
Craft Glass in the Studio or Trade with neighbors
I lost my telescope in a fateful shipwreck. I'll need to make another before my next voyage!
With this telescope, I'll be able to see ships a-comin' on the horizon!
Craft a Knife in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors
Craft Rope in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors
This is fun! Usually I'M the one getting boarded!
Craft Parchment in the Studio or Trade with neighbors
Craft Ink in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors
With a treasure map, I'll never need help finding my Chest again!
With this map, I'll be able to keep track of my booty!
Craft Grog in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
Craft Hot Buns in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
I'll need a hearty meal before I build my new ship. Time for a pirate's dinner!
Nothing like Grog and Hot Buns to make a girl feel like a pirate again.
Acquire 1 Bubbly Grog as a gift to Antonio
Craft Grog in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors
I wonder if Antonio can hold his Grog? Let's find out.
Antonio loved the grog! I'll make a pirate out of him yet.
Craft Rope in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors
Maybe the shore's not so bad a place to be. I've got a loyal crew right here!
Now everyone can get a taste of my Grog!
Torchlight makes everyone look good. As does squinting.
{player} helped Rafael set up an intimate dinner.
Didn't get an invite? Take some Reputation to soften the blow.
Buy 1 Table for an intimate dinner for the stranger and Rafael.
Buy 2 Torches to add that romantic glow.
Get Chicken Meat from feeding Adult Chickens. Feed Chickens to grow them into adulthood.
Defeating Senor Shadows' Beasties didn’t bring her out. She is both beautiful AND tough. We've never met, but already I am in love! Prepare to be wooed!
And still nothing! Why does the stranger risk herself in the Gloom? Oddly, this makes me like her more. Still, we need to rescue her!
{player} is gaining experience by beating up bad guys in CastleVille.
Join the good fight and get some free XP.
Visit your new neighbor the Duke.
Click the Neighbor Bar to Visit the Duke. Click on animals in the Duke's Kingdom to help him
Click on beasties in the Duke's Kingdom to help him.
Earn 5 Reputation by helping your new neighbor.
Remember, my Kingdom is strong because of allies! Having more Neighbors gives you valuable Reputation, Energy and useful items. I suggest you add Friends as soon as possible!
Remember, my Kingdom is strong because of allies! Having more Neighbors gives you valuable Reputation, Energy and useful items. I suggest you add Friends as soon as possible!
Oh no, Beasties are in my Kingdom! Please come to my aid - I can't handle them without you!
Thanks for your help! With every Kingdom working together, we can stop the Beasties and the Gloom!
If {player} smells a little funny, it's just the Ogre's Belches. Probably.
Hold your nose and grab some Ogre's Belches!
Arrgh! Tear up some Grass in frustration.
Click on nature items like Grass to clear them.
Gather 10 Ogre's Belch to melt the Chest's lock.
Clear Grass to gather Ogre's Belch.
Melt the lock on the Treasure Chest.
Get the Ogre's Belch, then click the chest to melt the lock.
If we can't break the lock, maybe we can melt it! Some Ogre's Belches should do the trick.
Ugh! All the Ogre's Belch did was make a stink. The chest is still locked!
Hide your wallet, hide your keys…
{player} is pickin' all the locks up in here!
Get to clickin' below before the free Coins are gone!
Have 7 Fairy Wings to waft the stench away.
Gather 5 Animal Bones to pick the chest's lock.
Banish Beasties to gather Animal Bones.
Try to open the Treasure Chest
Collect the Animals bones, then Click to open the Treasure Chest.
Maybe we can pick the lock open... AFTER clearing up those stinky Ogre's Belches!
I think I heard the lock click. Let's see what's inside!
You found the Crossbones from my old ship, the Santa Lucia! I've got plans for that... will you keep it safe for me?
{player} grabbed a handful of loot and wants to share the rewards!
Get a rare Gold Brick before they're all gone!
Use the Sell option in the Designer Tools to sell items.
Banish 2 Thieves before they steal the treasure!
Earn rewards like crafting materials and Crystal Shards by banishing Beasties.
That Foul Wretch's Thieves are trying to steal our treasure! Hurry and banish them!
That was a close one. If I ever catch him, I'll make shark bait of that wretched wizard!
{player} helped Yvette get ready to venture into the Gloom and wants to equip you, too!
Be prepared. Collect a Crystal Shard! You'll need it!
Customize your Character any way you see fit!
Have 2 Chocolate Bars to snack on while you explore for Yvette's Old Farm House.
This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Don't forget to feed the animals before you leave. Feed 2 Animals to Adulthood.
It takes multiple feedings to grow an animal to adulthood. You can also craft or buy Animal Treats to do it instantly.
We could be searching for my home for days! Weeks even! I've never been on a big trip. What do we need?
I'm so excited! The Old Farmhouse is near a river. Don't fall in! I don't have a clothes line.
{player} made sure Yvette didn't get lost in the Gloom and found something worth sharing!
Don't lose out -- collect free Energy!
Explore to find Yvette's Old Farmhouse in the Gloom. The foundation is probably all that's left.
It is probably in disarray now and just the foundation is there. Yvette mentioned it had red mushrooms growing by it.
Have 6 Spyglasses to look for Yvette's Old Farmhouse.
I'm not sure which way my home is. I get so lost, the Gloom can't find me. 'It's by a river' doesn't help?
You did it! You saved my old Farmhousefrom the Gloom! Daddy, are you home? Daaaaa-ddy! Where'd he go?
{player} fixed up my house and found some Coins lying around!
Buy 4 Rivers to replace the old dried up creek.
Buy Rivers from the Market in the Nature tab.
Clear all the roots in the yard.
Click on roots to Clear them.
Looks like Daddy hasn't been home for a while. Can you help fix up the house so the Gloom can't come back?
Oo, it's all warm and inviting again, and I bet it's Gloom-proof! Wish it were also mess-proof.
{player} uncovered a note from Yvette's father in CastleVille.
Put on your sleuth hat and collect some XP!
Have 2 Wool Cloth to dust the house with.
You must have a Studio and Tailor to craft this item. Purchase Crafting buildings in the Market.
Visit Neighbors and do activities in their Kingdom to earn Reputation Hearts.
Clear away 5 rocks, plants or trees.
Some nature items will take several clicks to clear. You can also clear tree stumps.
I'll tidy up inside the house. If you clean the yard, it'll inspire others to stand up to the Gloom!
Whew! All that cleaning was a lot of wo - you found what? A note? From Daddy?! W-what does it say?
{player} is on the way to unraveling a mystery, and wants to celebrate with you!
There's no mystery in how to collect your Coins! Get some now!
Have 8 Regal Hoes to help with the clearing.
Tend the flowers near Yvette's old farmhouse.
Flowers take some time until you can tend them again.
Banish 5 Beasties, nasty creatures of the Gloom.
Click on Beasties to Banish them.
Daddy's favorite? Oh! His favorite flowers! Let's find some - Uh oh... I think some Beasties are lurking!
I love the way these flowers smell. You found another note? It must be another clue!
{player} solved a big problem with some Pizza!
True story. {player} wants to share a slice of rewards!
Would you like some extra cheese with your free XP?
This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have 1 Cloth Apron. Don't want those Hot Buns getting on your outfit!
This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Put your Cooking to good use. Use one cooking item.
Use items in the Consumables section of your Inventory.
My favorite food? Pizza! But what does that have to do with portals or the Gloom? Only one way to find out.
That pizza was good, but it was missing something. I know, mushrooms!
{player} has a lead on a disappearance and wants to share the reward!
Get your own clue by collecting some Reputation!
Visit a Neighbor and fish in there pond or barrel! Don't wast yours! fish from it.
Use 1 Fishing Bait from your Inventory.
Fishing Bait will yeild better loot! You can either Craft or purchase Fishing Bait.
I always liked mushroom pizza. Daddy's next clue must be near the mushrooms by the river.
You found the note! Daddy must have a secret so big, he's afraid the Gloomy One will find out about it.
{player} rounded up some grog and wants to share in the fun.
Grab a glass and collect some Coins!
Help Yvette relax by Harvesting 10 Strawberries in your Kingdom.
Click on Empty Farm Plots to plant Crops.
Relax Yvette with some Bubbly Grog. She'll need 3.

Have 10 pails of water to make Yvette a yummy bath.
Fish to uncover the Pail and other items in the pond. It takes some time for the pond to restock.
Overcome my fear? There's the Gloom, angry bunnies... I should relax before I really scare myself.
How sweet of you! Daddy always hid grog in the cellar, where I was afraid - Of course! The cellar!
This could get very scary very fast!
{player} faced the creepy cellar and found a golden egg.
Stay brave and grab some Eggs.
Have 2 Candles to light the way.
This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have 1 Knife for Yvette to use as protection.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have 10 Whetstones to get the knife nice and sharp.
Daddy hid the treasure in our cellar! I was too afraid to go there, but not now, with all the Gloom.
Eeek! Okay, still scared of the dark. But I found a note - and a golden egg! Will it stop the Gloom?
{player} just experienced the stuff of fairytales and wants to share the fun with you!
Get your fairytale and collect some Energy now!
This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have a Bottle of Ink to write with.
This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Visit 10 different Neighbors' Kingdoms to leave copies of the note - just in case.
Click on the Neighbor bar to visit their Kingdoms.
My father is so brave! I’m staying to fight the Gloom. I'll leave him a note if - WHEN - he returns.
The egg hatched into a golden goose! Don't see that every day. It's a sign we'll beat the Gloom!
{player} doomed some Gloom by knocking out some Beasties.
Get some Energy so you can put up a fight!
Click on Beasties to Banish them.
The path to saving your Kingdom lies before you! Be warned - it will not be easy.
Your first task is a simple one... FIGHT!
You are able to banish the creatures of the Gloom. Prove yourself a worthy ruler, and you may even defeat the dark wizard responsible for them.
{player} provided for the Kingdom and wants to provide for you, too.
Hold out your hands and get some free Coins!
Provide 4 Houses as shelter from the Gloom.

Click on Houses to tax them, you can tax your Neighbors' houses too!
Harvest 20 Wheat to feed your Kingdom.
Buy Crops from the Nature section of the Market.
Your most important task as a proper ruler is to provide for your people. They will need homes and a source of food.
Good Work. As you provide for the needs of your people you will earn coins to build your Castle.
{player} mastered a few meals and whipped up your favorite.
Here are some free Grapes for dessert!
Buy from the Crafting tab of the Buildings section of the Market.
Click on the Kitchen and pick 4 items to Craft.
Put your Cooking to good use. Use one item made in the Kitchen from your inventory.
Use items in the Consumables section of your Inventory. Use one that was crafted in your Kitchen.
To truly provide for your kingdom, you must learn to make use of the materials provided by your crops and animals.
Mmm. There's no substitute for a well cooked meal. A happy Kingdom is the key to fighting the Gloom.
Haven't gotten your own Regal Hoe? {player} is willing to share!
Reach out and grab a Regal Hoe!
Move 5 items to make room for the Great Hall.

Clear away 6 rocks, plants or trees for the foundation.
Click on Nature items to clear them.
Have 4 Regal Hoes to help with the clearing.
Now that you've explored your Kingdom, you should find a place to start construction of a Great Hall. You may need to make some room.
The Great Hall will be a place to plan your fight against the Dark One and the Gloom. We should begin building it immediately.
{player} is starting construction on their Great Hall!
{player} is hard at work erecting a Great Hall and wants to help you do the same.
Put on your hardhat and grab some materials to build your own!
Prove your knowledge. Reach level Player 9.

Build Royal Buildings to raise your Castle Level.
Place and construct the foundation of the Great Hall.
Place the Great Hall from your Inventory and complete the first stage of construction.

Now that you've got a start on your Great Hall, you need to construct fortifications to defend it.
Good work! That Woeful Wizard will have a hard time breaking your defenses. Just don't swim in your Moat. Trust me.
{player}'s Kingdom is fully fortified with 2 Barracks!
Get some free Stone to help you protect your Kingdom.
Build Barracks and other Royal Buildings to improve your Castle and fight the Gloom!
Collect coins to build your castle. Tax the Barracks 3 times.

You've made a good start on fortifying your Kingdom, but there's more to be done!
An intimidating Barracks, indeed! A show of strength goes a long way in detering Beastie attacks.
{player} is showing off a softer side.

Soften up and collect a free Dandelion!

Buy 3 Nature items to fight the unnatural Gloom.

A true Kingdom is both powerful and beautiful. Spruce things up to inspire your subjects to fight the Gloom.
Well done. Keep this up, and your Kingdom will become the stuff of legend. As will you!
{player} is a step closer to completing their Great Hall!
{player}'s Great Hall is now just a little greater!
Move your royal rear and get some free XP.

Build Royal Buildings to raise your Castle Level.
Continue construction of the Great Hall.
Gather materials to complete the next stage of construction.

Your work is paying off, and your Great Hall is gaining greatness!

Click on the Studio to Craft.
Show off your new creations. Place 1 Decoration from your inventory.

You have given your subjects shelter and protection. Keep them happy. Construct a Studio to provide culture and entertainment.
Just remember - all work and no play makes your Kingdom a gloomy one!
{player} is plotting some crafty additions to their Kingdom.

Build 1 new Crafting Building for your kingdom.
Build more crafting buildings to unlock new recipes and craft multiple items at once.

Gather supplies for your Castle. Collect from 7 Crafting Support Buildings.
Collect 7 times from Buildings bought in the Crafting section of the Market that are not the Workshop, Kitchen, or Studio.
If it's a thriving Kingdom you want, I suggest you ramp up your manufacturing with a new crafting building.
Use your new crafts to enhance your Castle and fend off the Dark One's minions.
{player}'s Kingdom is the place to be!
{player} has attracted quite a few subjects to their Kingdom.
Get popular with a free Crystal Shard.
Explore gloomy areas to find people to rescue from the Gloom.
Craft 5 Grape Juice to celebrate with your subjects.

Your subjects will love the new crafting building. Wait, how many subjects do you have?
Keep pushing back the Gloom and rescuing new subjects for your Kingdom!
{player} is getting busy by constructing mines and lumber camps.
Grab some Stones so you can get busy too!
Build a source for wood. Own 2 Logging Camps.
Buy in the Buildings section of the Market.
Gain access to more stone. Own 2 Mining Camps.
Buy in the Buildings section of the Market.
Make good use of your new buildings. Gather 20 times from mines and lumber mills.
Click on the Gathering Building when it is ready to collect building materials.
With all these subjects, you'll need more resources to build your Castle.
With a more productive Kingdom, you can make your Castle even stronger to fight The Gloombringer!
{player}'s Great Hall is looking better all the time.
Build your own Great Hall with some free Iron Ore.
Keep seeking more knowledge. Reach level 13.
Earn XP from activities and quests to gain levels.
Build Royal Buildings to raise your Castle Level.
Continue construction of the Great Hall.
Gather materials to complete the next stage of construction.
Your Great Hall is almost finished. The Dark Wizard must be growing nervouse now.
The next stage of your Great Hall is in reach. Make me proud!
Well done. Your Great Hall is almost in reach!

Learn the truth by collecting your reward…Coins!

Build a Chateau from the Houses tab of the Building section of the Market.
Gather more coins for your Castle. Tax 20 Houses.
Click on the Houses when they are ready to collect taxes.
The Gloom Maker will soon lash out against you by attacking your subjects. Construct stronger homes and earn even more coins for your Kingdom.
You're accumulating quite the fortune! But remember - a good ruler spends Coins for the good of the Kingdom.
{player} constructed a Vault to protect their wealth.
Grab some Alchemist Powder to make some gold of your own.
Protect your Coins! Build a Vault for your Kingdom.

All those Coins, and you don't have a Vault yet? You're braver that I thought.
The Vault will secure your Coins from The Gloom Lord's Thieves, and even earn you more!
After visiting so many Neighbors, {player}'s got Reputation to spare!
Visit Neighbors and do activities in their Kingdom to earn Reputation.
Visit 5 different Neighbors and help them by doing 5 actions in their Kingdoms.
Visit 5 Neighbors and perform 5 tasks in their Kingdom to help them.
Your Coins are safe, but maybe you should engage in some diplomacy with your Neighbors. Just in case.
Well done. Your Neighbors are important allies in the fight against the Gloom!
{player}'s Great Hall is greater than yours!
