Until then, get your free Crystal Shard now!
Make the beasties fear your presence. Reach level 15.
Earn XP from activities and quests to gain levels.
Build Royal Buildings to raise your Castle Level.
Complete the Great Hall for your Castle.
Gather materials to complete the final stage of construction.
Your Great Hall is complete! The Gloom Lord will not tolerate this challenge to his power for long. Be wary!
To complete your Great Hall, you must prove yourself worthy.
Congratulations! The Great Hall is yours! It stands as a symbol against The Gloom Bringer and his minions.
{player} looks the part and is willing to share some royal favor.
Here’s some free Coins to help you dress for success!
Buy from the Clothes section of the Market.
Have 1 Tailor to fit your new clothes.
Buy in the Crafting tab of the Building section of the Market.
What's a royal outfit without jewels? Have 8 Royal Jewels.
Now that your Kingdom has a Great Hall, you should look the part of a prosperous ruler!
A fine ensemble! But we are not done celebrating yet.
{player} is feasting in honor of their newly completed Great Hall.
Grab some energy to help make your hall great too!
Harvest 30 irrigated crops for the feast.
Move Empty Plots near water to irrigate them.
Animals will periodically hunger, click animals with an arrow above them.
Cook 5 items in your Kitchen for the feast.
Click on a Kitchen or the Crafting button to start crafting a Cooking item.
Mmm, turkey... Oh! Congratulations, your Highness!
Today is a great day. Let us have a feast to celebrate - and for the time being, forget about the Gloom.
Aah, a fine feast! You are indeed a great ruler. And any proper ruler needs a crown. Here - it is an honor, your Majesty!
{player} is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!
Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!
Check back periodically, then Pull the rope on the Trap once it is ready
It can take a while before the trap will have it's prey inside. Click on the Trap
Wait a bit to before triggering the trap. Once the ogre is near, pull on the rope really fast!
{player} is fending off a Beastie attack and has rewards to share!
Join the fight and claim your rewards!
Visit neighbors and bash 3 beasties in other kingdoms
You can never have too much, Collect 10 Stone from Mining rocks in Neighboring Kingdoms
Use the neighbor bar to visit your neighbors and Mine their rocks
Trade 3 times with neighbors to get some items you need
Visit a Neighbor and Trade with them at their Bazaar
Sometimes your Neighbors need help bashing Beasties. I'm sure they'd appreciate a hand!
Your Neighbors really appreciated your help, they told me.
{player} just built and impressive wall for their Kingdom.
They also have a free Rubble Wall piece for you…how nice!
Place 5 Rubble Walls to enhance your castle.
Buy Rubble Walls in the Decor section of the Market
Get your Castle to level 10 so you can explore
Place walls to raise your Castle Level.
It takes a special ruler to turn back the Gloom. Build your Castle so you can rescue Rafael!
The grander your Castle is, the more Gloom you can dispel, and the more people you'll be able to save!
A good man is hard to find…
But {player} found one! They just rescued Rafael, the handsome woodsman.
Rafael comes bearing gifts. Grab some coins now.
Those walls will enhance your Castle. Let's check on Rafael again, you should be able to push back that Gloom now!!
Click the Gloomy area to find Rafael. Exploring requires Expansion Crystals, which can be made at the Workshop from Crystal Shards. The Crystal Shards drop from Beasties or asking Friends for them.
Thank you for saving me, my friend. I lingered too long in the Gloom, searching for its source - and a girl! Perhaps you would be willing to help?
The walls you built raised your Castle Level. Now let's find out if you can dispel the Gloom and save Rafael!
Amazing! You ARE the ruler we've been waiting for. The Gloom Maker is in for a surprise!
{player} just experienced the stuff of fairytales and wants to share the fun with you!
Get your fairytale and collect some Energy now!
Buy decorations in the Decor tab of the Market.
Buy 4 Rivers to make a romantic stream.
Buy Rivers from the nature tab in the Market.
Have 8 Love Letters. Don't get Sonja and Yvette confused.
Tonight I meet with Yvette. A few letters of love will dispel the presence of Senor Shadow. If only for the two of us.
You have brought me joy with your help! Yvette's eyes like stars twinkle in the moonlight!
Love in the Time of Gloom: 9 of 10
Earn XP from activities to gain levels
{player} just collected wood logs to build a home for their new loyal subject, Yvette.
Click here to get Wood too!
You have a new Quest from the Duke.
Gather 5 Wood Logs by Chopping Trees.
Click on a tree to chop it.
Click on a rock to mine it.
You've added your first subject to your Kingdom! Before you can complete Yvette's house, you'll need to gather resources.
A growing Kingdom requires lots of resources. Good thing wood grows on trees!
Chop trees to collect 5 Wood Logs.
Good things are cropping up in {player}'s Kingdom!
{player} is planting a mini vineyard in CastleVille!
Grab some free Grapes while they're fresh!
Plant 3 Grapes on the Farm Plots.
Click a Farm Plot to plant crops.
Crops ripen over time. When they're ready, click the crops to harvest them.
Taking on the Dark One's Beasties and his Gloom will make you want to eat. Trust me, I know a lot about that! Planting crops would be a good start.
These Grapes make a great drink, and they provide Coins, too. Let's grow some more!
{player}'s Farm Plots are multiplying, and so are the rewards!
Try some freshly-harvested Flax. It's delicious!
Buy from the Farm tab in the Nature section of the Market.
Click an empty plot to plant crops.
Click a ripe crop to harvest.
The more Farm Plots you have, the more crops you can grow - and the more Coins you'll earn, adding to your save-the-world-from-gloom fund!
Now that you can plant many crops at once, I'll show you how to grow them faster! Careful though, harvesting draws the attention of Gloom Rats!
{player}'s crops are growing faster with a little irrigation.
Get a free Farm Plot to plant your own crops!
Clear 10 items around your water sources.
Click on plants, rocks and tree stumps to clear them.
Move 5 Farm Plots. Place them next to water to irrigate them.
Click Design Mode and select Move to move objects.
Crops placed by water will grow faster.
Want to perk up your crops so they grow more quickly? Plant them near water.
Mmm! Now you can provide food for your Kingdom. When you throw your first feast, don't forget to invite me!
{player}'s Kingdom is full of cute chicks!
Stop by and check them out. You might get clucky!
Cluck on over and grab some Coins!
Buy Chickens from the Animals section of the Market's Nature tab
Click on Chickens to feed them. They start young, but soon grow!
Egad! There's beasties in my kingdom now! Please come help!
A Kingdom can never have too many cute chicks! Keep them happy and fed and you'll earn lots of Coins.
There now, isn't that more fun than collecting taxes?
Talk to the Animals: Quest 1 of 2
Cows are hoofin' it to {player}'s Kingdom!
Get moo-vin' and grab some Coins before they're udderly gone!
Buy Cows from the Animals section of the Market's Nature tab.
Click on Cows to feed them. They start young, but soon grow!
Spend Reputation Hearts to buy 1 Large Trough for your thirsty animals.
Reputation Hearts can be spent on decorations or potions in the Market. Get more by doing actions in your Neighbors' Kingdoms.
Think baby Chickens are cute? Wait til you see baby Cows!
Keep your Cows fed and happy so they'll grow big. Adults provide more rewards!
Talk to the Animals: Quest 2 of 2
The only sure things in life…
{player} just earned lots of coins by collecting taxes and has plenty to share!
Cha-ching… get some free coins for yourself.
Click on houses to collect taxes.
Taxes will get you Coins, but you wouldn't believe the red tape! You can also earn Coins raising adorable animals!
You can earn Coins to build your Castle by collecting taxes from Yvette's house. It's for a good cause, so she won't mind!
Collect taxes from every house so you can build your Castle and push back the Gloom!
Drat! You don't have a high enough Castle Level to explore. Let's raise your Castle Level so you can search for Rafael.
Hurry! Click those nasty Beasties to banish them.
Yvette has a Quest. Click on her to help.
{player} just built a new home for Yvette, their first subject in CastleVille.
Come get some Stone to shelter your royal subjects.
Find a good location and place Yvette's house.
You can find the plans for Yvette's House in the Buildings tab of your Inventory.
Gather materials to build the house.
Chop trees and mine rocks to gather materials
Build Yvette's House to add her to your Kingdom.
Once you have enough materials, click the foundation to construct the house.
I love my new home. I'm so happy to be living in... wait what do you call this place, anyway?
I'm so excited to join your Kingdom! But, um... could you build me a house so I'll be safe from the Beasties?
My new house sure is cozy... and a perfect haven from those Beasties!
Place Yvette's House from your Inventory
Click on Yvette's House foundation to build it.
Click on Yvette's House foundation to build it.
Gather Wood Logs and Stone to build Yvette's house. I'm sure she'll make a loyal subject!
Please help, that Gloom Wolf is attacking my Sheep!
Banish that Gloom Wolf to save the Sheep!

Thanks for the help! I'm Kathleen. I was leading my flock through the forest when the Gloom Wolves attacked. Those blasted creatures have been getting more brazen ever since that Woeful Wizard started filling the world with Gloom. Would you mind taking a minute and calming the sheep down?
Tend 4 Sheep to help calm them down from the attack.
Click on the Sheep to calm them down.
Feed 8 Sheep in your Neighbors' Kingdoms to see if they are okay too.
Feed Neighbors' Sheep to make sure they are okay.
That vicious Gloom Wolf is after my Sheep! Please help them!
Thanks! My flock is safe for now, but there are bound to be more Gloom Wolves nearby!
Place 8 Wood Fences to build a sheep pen to keep the sheep safe.
Purchase Wooden Fences from the Market or craft in the Workshop.
Tend your Sheep 20 times to help them grow big and strong.
Click on your Sheep to feed them.
Place 3 Grass from the Market so the Sheep have something to eat.
Buy Grass from the Nature tab in the Market.
You handled one Gloom Wolf, but the pack is still out there. Let's build a pen to keep the Sheep safe!
You know what they say - the pen is mightier than the sword! Or in this case the Gloom Wolf!
Collect 4 Lamp Oil to keep the night light lit all night
Ask your friends to give you some Lamp Oil.
Gather 10 Wood Logs so you have something to burn
Chop some trees to collect some Wood Logs.
Visit 4 Unique Neighbor's Kingdoms to look for Gloom Wolves
Visit different Kingdoms to check for Gloom Wolves.
Sheep get scared at night without a nightlight because of the Gloom. I don't understand why the Gloom Lord likes things so dark!
They're sleeping! We didn't even have to read them a bedtime story.
Collect 10 Wool for the wolf disguises.
Tend adult Sheep to collect Wool.
Collect 3 Wolf Hair to help disguise the Sheep.
Bash Gloom Wolves for a chance to find Wolf Hair.
Ask friends for 6 Gloom Wolf Pelts to make the disguises believable.
Ask your friends to give you Wolf Pelts.
If we dress the sleepy Sheep up like Gloom Wolves, maybe the pack won't attack!
The Gloom Wolf costumes scare the Sheep, but I don't know if the Beasties will be fooled.
… and is now in the Kingdom-saving business.
Get some Coins and a glimpse of the big picture now.
A note from Alastair, you say? Magnificent! He's the most powerful wizard in the land... an excellent ally to have against the Dark One!
Click the Full Screen button for a better view of your Kingdom.
Click the Full Screen Options button the far right side of the screen. Use Full screen mode to get a better view of your whole Kingdom.
Click the ground and drag to look around your Kingdom.
Click and drag to pan around and view different parts of your Kingdom.
I sense great potential in you. Seek me out. If you find me, I will show you the path of the true ruler.
The Gloom has shrouded many things in your Kingdom - treasure, subjects… and me, of course.
{player} is building up a Kingdom that's the envy of a mysterious dark force.
Grab some Coins and attract some attention…but be careful!
Improve your Castle by buying 1 Maiden's Tower.
The Maiden's Tower can be found in the Buildings Tab of the Market.
Gather materials and construct your Maiden's Tower.
Collect materials to construct the Maiden's Tower. This is the first step of construction.
Your view is still limited. Start work on a tower, reaching into the sky. It will expand your view and your reach.
The structure is sound, but is lacking its true power. Keep at it. Your work will soon be rewarded.
{player} is venturing out into the Gloom!
With the Maiden Tower complete, {player} has successfully expanded their Kingdom.
Get a free Energy to celebrate!
Alastair, he has always stood against Senor Shadow and the Gloom. He even saved me from the Beasties, when I was but a boy!
Add Crew members to complete the Maiden's Tower.
Invite crew by clicking on your Maiden's Tower and then clicking on the Recruit button.
Ah. my friend - I think the wizard's birds are coming from over here. Explore in that direction if you wish to find him!
Explore out into the Gloom 1 time.
Use Expansion Crystals to explore. Craft them Crystal Shards at the Workshop. Get Crystal Shards from Beasties or ask your Friends.
The power of your Castle comes not from brick and mortar, but from hearts and minds. Gather your allies and see its true power revealed!
Well done! Now you can see unhindered. But finding me will take more than vision.
It Takes a Village, a wise wizard once said…
{player} is following Alastair's advice and building some cottages in their Kingdom.
Buy some cottages with these free Coins!
Provide 2 Cottages as shelter from the Gloom.
Buy Cottages in the Buildings section of the Market.
Click on Houses to tax them.
Gather 5000 coins for the Royal Coffers.
Continue to collect taxes from buildings to get more coins.
Ooh... another feathered friend! She's brought word from Alastair.
A Healthy Kingdom has many residents. Provide more homes to support your Castle.
These homes can be taxed for precious Coins to help grow your Castle and explore the Gloom.
Construction of the Barracks is complete in {player}'s Kingdom.
Get a rare Gold Brick to build your own!
You can buy a Barracks in the Buildings Tab in the market.
Click on a fully built Barracks to Collect Taxes.
Piercing further into the gloom will take great power. You will need to construct more buildings.
These buildings will provide you with the strength to fight the dark force behind the gloom. You are ready to explore further.
{player} saved Alastair from a terrible fate!
{player} has earned the admiration of a Kingdom.
Bask in the admiration and get a Crystal Shard. It will help you explore!
Explore the Gloomy Area and rescue Alastair.
Select the new area with Alastair in it and disperse the Gloom.
Ah, thank you for finding me. In return, I will help you build a Kingdom that can free this land from the Gloom Lord. Let us begin.
You are ready, seek me out and I will aid your fight against the Gloom!
The beasties are agents of an evil sorcerer who some refer to as The Gloom Lord. To rid your Kingdom of Gloom, you must stop him.
Did you hear that howl? The Gloom Wolves are on their way!
Banish 2 Gloom Wolves attacking the sheep before they get eaten!
Bash the Gloom Wolves to protect the Sheep.
Banish the Wolf Pack Leader to scare the Gloom Wolves off for good
Careful! The Wolf Pack Leader is stronger than the average Gloom Wolf.
Calm 4 Sheep down by tending to them. Poor dears.
Click on a sheep to feed it and calm it down.
The Gloom Wolves DEFINITELY weren't fooled by the Sheep's costumes. We're under attack!
Nice hit! Those Gloom Wolves are running back to his Gloominess with their tails between their legs.
Collect 8 Map Pieces from your friends to help Kathleen get home
Ask your friends to give you Map Pieces.
Care for 8 Sheep in your Neighbors' Kingdoms
Care for 8 Sheep in your Neighbors' Kingdoms to see if they were attacked too.
Visit 3 Neighbors to tell them you drove off the Pack Leader.
Thanks for all your help! I should be getting back home... but I don't know the way because of this blasted Gloom!
I think I can find my way now, but my Sheep are safer here. Please take good care of them! Maybe we'll run into each other again.
Yvette has another Quest. Click her to help.
We've been so busy saving the world from The Dark Lord and his beasties that we almost forgot about the Castle Berry Punch Festival! Let's take a break, have some fun and drink some punch.
Have 3 Wood Planks so you can build a sturdy keg.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have 2 Iron Bars so you to reinforce the keg.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
During the festival each kingdom makes their best punch to be judged by the other kingdoms. We should start ours.
A fine keg. That should hold more than enough punch for the festival. Hah!
Collect 20 Wood Logs to fuel the fire.
Harvest Trees or tend a Lumber Camp to gather Wood Logs.
Collect 4 Copper Tubes to construct the apparatus.
Ask your friends if they have any extra copper tubes.
Collect 4 Stone Blocks to build a sturdy base.
Now that we have the keg we need to build the brewing apparatus.
Heart be still! This punch could knock the hair off of a Gloom Rat.
Harvest 25 Grapes to give the punch some flavor.
If you plant crops in irrigated plots they grow faster!
Collect 5 Pails of Water to add some body to the punch.
Go Fishing to collect Pails of Water.
Get 5 Cloves from your friends to add some punch to the brew.
Each batch of punch starts with the same mixture. Gather up all the ingredients so we can start ours.
Looks like your punch is off to a great start! I can't wait to let the others try it.
Collect 15 Berries to add a kick to the punch.
Click on Grass or Bushes to gather berries.
Gather 6 Yummhee Yeast so we can begin brewing.
Ask your friends for Yummhe Yeast.
Collect 20 Honey from neigbors' kingdoms to sweeten the concoction.
Tend flowers in your neighbors' kingdoms to gather honey.
Every batch of Castleberry Punch is a bit different. Let's gather the rest of the ingredients to finish off your batch
Hold on to your socks! This has a shot at being the best punch this year!
Everyone has been a bit down since the Gloom showed up. We should share our punch with your friends to raise their spirits!
Earn 50 Reputation from Neighbor visits to ensure you get all the votes.
Perform neighbor actions to gain Reputation.
Tax a House in 5 unique kingdoms to let some peasants taste your brew.
Visit neighbors and click on their houses to tax them.
Who's got the best Castle Berry Punch? Share some with neighbors and let them try it.
Your punch is a hit but is it the best? Those peasants you gave it to certainly thought so.
Change your character's apperance to get ready for the award ceremony.
Look for the character customization button just above the market button.
Visit the Duke's Kingdom to attend the award ceremony.
Click on the Duke's portrait to visit his Kingdom.
...Take one down, pass it around, 42 glasses of punch on the... Oh, hello there! Congratulations on winning you should have a glass with me to celebrate!
Drink 1 glasses of your punch and enjoy the fruits of your labors.
Look in your inventory for some of your punch.
Dress for success. Your punch made it to the final round this year!
Again, congratulations! I'm so happy I feel a song coming on...
{player} has taken to the skies to fight Gloom in a hot air balloon made from Cow Hide!
Grab some Cow Hide to fly high!
Have 10 Cow Hides to make an Adventure Balloon.
Get Cow Hides by feeding Adult Cows.
Have 30 Ogre's Belches to fill the Balloon.
Gather Ogre's Belch from clearing grasses or flowers.
Have 15 Piles of Sand for ballast for the Adventure Balloon.
Fish in ponds to get Piles of Sand as well as other items.
Adventure has prepared us. We're ready to find Senor Shadow. Navigate the world to find him. Don't use a kangaroo. Once is enough.
Alas, from our balloon we can see nothing beneath the Gloom! I wonder how Senor Shadow gets around.
Click the Neighbor Bar to Visit the Duke's Kingdom
The votes are in and this year's winner is...
Horray! Your punch won! You've got the best punch around!
Hurry! The turkey leg is only making it hungrier!
Remarkable! You banished those Beasties... just like the rulers of legend! You must be someone special...
Marvelous! I'm sure you can handle things. I've got to go make sure the Beasties haven't overrun my Castle, but I'll check in with you soon. In the meantime, you should speak with this lovely lass!
Thanks for helping with those Beasties! I'm Yvette. This seems to be the last place not covered in Gloom... will you let me stay in your Kingdom?
{player} is getting schooled by the Duke!
The Duke has been busy teaching {player} about Castle Ground.
Copy off their test and get some free Coins too!

The Courtyard is a special area of the castle that will help you earn more money from buildings that produce coins. The Courtyard is the cleared area in the middle of your kingdom that looks like dirt.
Build 1 Cottage to collect taxes from.
Try moving one of your Cottages onto Courtyard.
Move 1 taxable building onto the Courtyard.
Try moving one of your Cottages onto Courtyard.
Tax a building on Courtyard to get bonus Coins!
Click on a building on Courtyard to tax it and get bonus coins.
Residents like to know that they're protected. If you put their homes on Castle Ground, they'll be willing to pay more in taxes!
The Courtyard doesn't just have to be dirt. There are all kinds of styles to fit your royal taste.
A Little Something Extra Quest 1 of 3
Laying the groundwork for a huge Kingdom!
{player} is building a bigger castle and earning some bonus with Castle Ground!
Get some Castle Ground and bring the bonus to your Kingdom!
There are different kinds of Courtyard available in the Market. Go buy some!
Move a Maiden's Tower on to Courtyard.
If you don't have a Maiden's Tower you can purchase it in the market. If you have one, try moving it using design mode.
Tired of waiting? Why not build another Cottage to speed things up?
Keep this up, and you'll have plenty of Coins to grow your Kingdom. Just watch out for the Dark One's Thieves!!
Having a hard time fitting all your buildings onto Courtyard? Why not loosen the belt a bit by buying some more?
Nothing like some room to breathe. Don't relax too long though, there's still plenty of Gloom out there!
A Little Something Extra Quest 2 of 3
The Dark One's forces are attacking - stop them before they spread the Gloom! Banish the invading beasties!
Look my friend! You have another message from our wayward wizard.
I've tolerated you and your puny Castle long enough! Now you'll learn what happens to those who challenge ME!
Alastair...so you're the one guiding this miserable upstart. My Beasties will destroy you both!
{player} is building a moat for their castle... No skinny-dipping!
Jump in and {player} will give you some free Coins.
FAUGRIMM! He's the dark wizard I've been telling you about. He gains power through misery and wants to cover the world in Gloom!
Click on Thieves to Banish them.
Click on Goblins to Banish them.
Have 10 Moat tiles to protect your Castle from more of Faugrimm's friends
Buy from the Water tab of the Nature section in the Market.
Now you can put a name and a face with all the Beastie presence and Gloom. With your help, we can put an end to Faugrimm!
Bravo! Hmm, that was easier than it probably should have been. Anyway, looks like those Thieves dropped something...
Feel free to look around! Click the House on your Neighbor Bar when you want to return home.
You'll need materials to complete the house. Click the X button on the top right for now.
Bubble, bubble {player} is cooking up trouble!
{player} is whipping up a magic brew!
Have a taste and get energized!
My book! How did you...? No matter - you will NEVER break the curse laid upon it!
Have 40 Chili Peppers, this has be hot to melt his spell.
Click an Empty Farm Plot to plant Chili Peppers.
Ask Friends for Eyes of Newt.
Explore to the Ancient Ritual Site to the East, I need to go there to do my spell.
The Ritual Site just to the East of where Alastair was first found. Exploring requires Expansion Crystals, which can be made at the Workshop.
My book! I'll deal with those wretched Thieves later...after I DRAIN your magic, Alastair!
Fate has smiled upon us with the discovery of Faugrimm's Book. Before I can read it, I will need some time and materials to break the binding spell he has on it.
You will need to be vigilant as I break the book's binding spell. Faugrimm will know I have it as soon as I begin. Oh, and I imagine he won't be happy. Not that he ever is.
Click on the Sheep to calm them down.
That vicious Gloom Wolf is after my Sheep! Please help them!
Thanks! My flock is safe for now, but there are bound to be more Gloom Wolves nearby!
Click on the Sheep to calm them down.
That vicious Gloom Wolf is after my Sheep! Please help them!
Thanks! My flock is safe for now, but there are bound to be more wolves nearby!
Click on the Sheep to calm them down.
That vicious Gloom Wolf is after my Sheep! Please help them!
Thanks! My flock is safe for now, but there are bound to be more Gloom Wolves nearby!
Click on the Sheep to calm them down.
That vicious Gloom Wolf is after my Sheep! Please help them!
Thanks! My flock is safe for now, but there are bound to be more Gloom Wolves nearby!
Click on the Sheep to calm them down.
That vicious Gloom Wolf is after my Sheep! Please help them!
Thanks! My flock is safe for now, but there are bound to be more Gloom Wolves nearby!
Click on the Sheep to calm them down.
That vicious Gloom Wolf is after my Sheep! Please help them!
Thanks! My flock is safe for now, but there are bound to be more Gloom Wolves nearby!
Click on the Sheep to calm them down.
That vicious Gloom Wolf is after my Sheep! Please help them!
Thanks! My flock is safe for now, but there are bound to be more Gloom Wolves nearby!
Click on the Sheep to calm them down.
That vicious Gloom Wolf is after my Sheep! Please help them!
Thanks! My flock is safe for now, but there are bound to be more Gloom Wolves nearby!
{player} is breaking an evil spell with a Spear of Humility!
Be humble too and get some free Energy!
Oh no, Alastair is trapped! We must free him! Maybe a Spear of Humility could pierce the Totem of Pride!
Craft 1 Spear of Humility to smash the Totem of Pride.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have 20 Royal Jewels to smash into the Spear tip.
Break the Totem of Pride try to free Alastair.
Click the Totem of Pride that is holding Alastair.
The Dark One himself! This is too much for an old Duke. Break those totems to free poor Alastair - we need him now more than ever!
Alastair is one step closer to being free! Two more totems to go, I hope we can save him before it is too late!
{player} is one step closer to releasing their trapped subjects with their Dagger of Strength.
These free Stones will help you be sharp too!
Well done, my friend! Only 2 totems remain. For the Totem of Weakness, perhaps try a Dagger of Strength?
Craft 1 Dagger of Strength to crack the Totem of Power.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have 10 Whetstones to sharpen the Dagger of Strength as much as possible.
Use the Dagger of Strength to crack the Totem of Power.
Click the Totem of Power that is holding Alastair.
I've always wondered what the Dark One looked like. Scary bloke! Poor Alastair is looking weaker by the moment. We need to get him free!
Bravo! He is almost free. Alastair, if you can hear me, hang on!
{player} is using a Bundle of Love Arrows to fight the forces of evil.
Defend your Kingdom against the Gloom with some Free Reputation.
There's only one Totem left! Don't give up now!
Craft 1 Bundle of Love Arrows to pearce the Totem of Hate.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have 20 Love Letters to wrap around the arrows.
Pierce the Totem of Hate to free Alastair!
Click the Totem of Hate that is holding Alastair.
I am free! Well done - and thank you. Now, we shall settle this!
Arrgh! How did you defeat my curse? No matter. I will end this NOW!
Quickly, banish Faugrimm into the Gloom and take back your Kingdom!
Oh! We are so close to freeing Alastair. Destroying that final totem is going to take an act of love!
Wonderful! Alastair is free! Now he can find out what secrets Faugrimm's book holds.
{player} just started crafting items in CastleVille. It's not as hard as it looks!
Get in on the crafting action with some free Wood!
To build bigger and better buildings for your castle you'll need to start Crafting new materials.
Purchase a Workshop from the Market.
Get Alchemist Power from tending Neighbors' crafting buildings
Click on the Workshop to start crafting.
The Dark One's minions are formidable, but you can craft powerful weapons to banish them!
As your level increases, you'll unlock more crafting recipes to aid you in the fight against the Dark One!
{player} is using a sturdy club to banish some evil in CastleVille.
This free Wood Club will help you get clubbing too!
Collect the Wood Club from the Workshop.
Click on the Workshop to collect the Club.
Use the Wood Club from your inventory to put the hurt on a Beastie.
Go to your Inventory and click on the Wood Club to activate it, then click on a Beastie to use it.
Use the Wood Club, and a few extra whacks if necessary, to Banish a Beastie.
With a bit of preparation, you can keep one step ahead of those blasted Beasties!
Beastie invasions can be a serious threat to your Kingdom. You would be wise to have a handful of weapons ready... just in case!
Excellent! Each weapon has limited use, so remember to keep extras on hand!
{player} is using a sturdy club to banish some evil in CastleVille.
Free Reputation will help you get clubbing too!
Get Silver Ore by mining rocks and collecting ore from a mine.
Sell 2 Silver Ore from your inventory.
While in your inventory click on the Sell Button of an item to sell it.
Every coin helps in the fight against the Dark One!
Taking on the Dark One isn't cheap! If you ever get low on Coins, you can sell items from your Inventory to earn more.
If fighting the Gloom Lord drains your coffers, selling is a great way to earn some quick Coins!
There is a local legend that says magical creatures live at the bottom of ponds and pools. They are known for collecting unusual items, especially useful ones, and hiding them in the depths.
Go fishing 3 times to see what you can pull out of the pond!
Who knows what's lying at the bottom of your pond? Click on it to see what you can fish out!
Pull 1 Gold Brick out of your pond by fishing in it.
If you don't find a Gold Bar right away, don't get discouraged. Keep trying and you'll find one eventually!
You can also get the items you need from your subjects. Give them what they want, and they'll help you out, too!
Asking Friends is just one way to get items. Try fishing in the pond... you might pull up the thing you need most!
Fantastic! Who knows what kinds of things you can pull out of that enchanted pool.
Click on Yvette's house to tax it for Coins.
…For now. An epic battle such as this deserves some epic rewards.
Grab a Wood Club and banish the Gloom Beasties in your Kingdom.
Banish the evil Faugrimm back to his realm.
Click on Faugrimm to Banish him.
Amazing! To be able to hit Faugrimm, you must be special! He is gone…for now. Let me study the book for a while before we try open it again.
You've won this round…but this Kingdom will still be MINE!
You are the only one that can Banish Faugrimm. Do it now!
Why do I feel like he will be back…
Laying the groundwork for a huge Kingdom!
{player} is building a bigger castle and earning some bonus with Castle Ground!
Get some Castle Ground and bring the bonus to your Kingdom!
Have 1 Lumber Camp in your kingdom.
If you haven't built a lumber camp yet you can find it in the Resources tab in the Buildings section of the Martket.
Move a Lumber Camp near some tress and see what happens!
If you already have a lumber camp near some trees try finding a spot with more.
Harvest the Lumber Camp 2 times to see the time reduction in action!
The time reduction bonus has a max of 50%. A Lumber Camp can only produce its resources twice as fast if it is near enough trees.
Did you know that other buildings can get bonuses based on there they are placed? Lumber Camps produce logs faster if placed near tress.
Mining Camps work the same way as Lumber Camps except with rocks. When you build a Mining Camp try placing it next to as many rocks as possible.
A Little Something Extra Quest 3 of 3
How!? But – this is impossible! You can’t banish ME! Oh, you’ll regret this!
Construction of the Barracks is complete in {player}'s Kingdom.
Get a rare Gold Brick to build your own!
You can buy a Barracks in the Buildings Tab in the market.
Click on a fully built Barracks to Collect Taxes.
Purchase a Workshop from the Buildings section of the Market.
Piercing further into the gloom will take great power. You will need to construct more buildings.
These buildings will provide you with the strength to fight the dark force behind the gloom. You are ready to explore further.
{player} saved Alastair from a terrible fate!
{player} has earned the admiration of a Kingdom.
Bask in the admiration and get a Crystal Shard. It will help you explore!
Exploration Crystals are required for Exploring. Have 6 to dispel the Gloom around Alastair.
Craft Exploration Crystals from Crystal Shards in the Workshop. Get Shards by banishing Beasties or asking Friends.
Explore the Gloomy Area and rescue Alastair.
Select the new area with Alastair in it and disperse the Gloom.
Ah, thank you for finding me. In return, I will help you build a Kingdom that can free this land from the Gloom Lord. Let us begin.
You are ready, seek me out and I will aid your fight against the Gloom!
The beasties are agents of an evil sorcerer who some refer to as The Gloom Lord. To rid your Kingdom of Gloom, you must stop him.
{player} enjoyed some Bubbly Grog made from Ogre's Belch.
Don't worry about the calories. Cod pieces have a slimming effect.
Have 1 Bubbly Grog to help drown out memories of the trapped Lady.
This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Buy 1 Barrel to keep the Grog coming.
Buy Barrels from the Decor section of the Market.
Feed 1 Cow in 4 different Neighbors' Kingdoms, you know, for fun.
Visit 4 different Neighbors and Feed 1 Cow in each of their Kingdoms.
I cannot sleep! Is the lady a trick of the Gloom meant to lure US in? We must distract ourselves!
Iss an excelente Grog *HIC* The Gloom shtranger can't distract uss from our cow's duty *HIC* I said duty *HIC* Cow's duty? Huh?
{player} is giving the Beasties a second chance!
Grab a Crystal Shard and spare a Beastie!
Purchase a Workshop from the Market.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Craft in a Workshop then sell from your Inventory.
If we show the Beasties some love, maybe they'll stop being so Gloomy!
Take THAT, Gloom! I'll rehabilitate all the Beasties, just you watch.
{player} has a bright idea to defeat the cursed chest. Wish them luck!
Cross your fingers and grab some Coins!
Gotta get out of here and think. Visit 8 different Neighbors and help their Kingdoms.
Visit 8 Neighbors and perform tasks in their Kingdom to help them.
Get 2 Thief Cloaks. Maybe we can trick the curse by looking like Beasties!
Get Thief Cloaks from banishing Thieves.
Cross your fingers and open the Cursed Chest!
Click Sonja's Cursed Chest to open it.
Looks like we'll have to be clever if we want to open that chest. Surely we can outwit this witch!
That blasted witch is smarter than I thought. Summoning Beasties? She must hang around that sneaking old sorcerer. Hmm...
{player} is looking for a few good men!
{player} is helping Yvette catch a prince and receiving Reputation points in return.
Celebrate {player}'s match-making skills with some extra Reputation.
Clear 7 grass to help Yvette find a frog to kiss.
Fish 10 times in a neighbor's kindgom to try and catch a frog.
Click on the a Pond to fish from it.
Collect 15 honey to help make the kiss less gross.
Do you know how to find a prince? I've heard that kissing frogs can work. Let's get it over with.
Yeeuck! Tastes like flies. But with that honey, it might catch on.
{player} gazed into Izzy's glowing orb and came away empty handed.
Get a refund of free Coins!
Craft 3 Candles to light the way for Izzy.
This item can be crafted after you build a Studio and a Tailor. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Purchase a Crystal Ball in the Market.
Have 10 Dragon Scales to enhance psychic powers.
I bet I could help you defeat his Gloominess. I just need to consult my horoscope first!
Astrology, astronomy... All I see is Gloom. That ball just HAS to be broken.
{player} solved a big problem with some Pizza!
True story. {player} wants to share a slice of rewards!
Would you like some extra cheese with your free XP?
This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have 1 Cloth Apron. Don't want Pizza sauce getting on your outfit!
This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Put your Cooking to good use. Use one cooking item.
Use items in the Consumables section of your Inventory.
My favorite food? Pizza! But what does that have to do with portals or the Gloom? Only one way to find out.
That pizza was good, but it was missing something. I know, mushrooms!
{player} has a lead on a disappearance and wants to share the reward!
Get your own clue by collecting some Reputation!
Fish in 10 Neighbors Kindgoms. Daddy would fish while I gathered mushrooms.
Visit a Neighbor and Fish in their pond or barrel. Yes, you can fish out of some barrels.
Use 1 Fishing Bait from your Inventory.
Fishing Bait will yeild better loot! You can either Craft or purchase Fishing Bait.
Clear 3 Mushrooms to look for clues.
I always liked mushroom pizza. Daddy's next clue must be near the mushrooms by the river.
You found the note! Daddy must have a secret so big, he's afraid the Gloomy One will find out about it.
{player} opened a Studio and is creating great masterpieces, if they do say so themselves!
Create your own work of art with a free Red Feather.
Construct a Studio to enhance your Kingdom's culture.
Buy from the Crafting tab of the Buildings section of the Market.
Craft 4 Artistry recipes from your Studio.
Click on the Studio to Craft.
Besides crafting decorations you can also buy them. Go buy 2 Deocrations and place them in your kingdom.
Go to your to the Market and find some Decorations to buy.
You have given your subjects shelter and protection. Keep them happy. Construct a Studio to provide culture and entertainment.
Just remember - all work and no play makes your Kingdom a gloomy one!
{player} just started crafting items in CastleVille. It's not as hard as it looks!
Get in on the crafting action with some free Wood!
To build bigger and better buildings for your castle you'll need to start Crafting new materials.
Purchase a Workshop from the Market.
Get 1 Alchemist Powder by visiting your neighbors and helping them.
Perform 5 actions in a neighbors kingdom for a chance to get Alchemist Powder as a reward.
Click on the Workshop to start crafting.
The Dark One's minions are formidable, but you can craft powerful weapons to banish them!
As your level increases, you'll unlock more crafting recipes to aid you in the fight against the Dark One!
Drat! You don't have a high enough Castle Level to explore. Let's raise your Castle Level so you can search for Rafael.
Sonja is helping {player} protect their Kingdom against the Beasties!
Grab some Coins to fortify your Kingdom today!
Have 20 walls to protect your Kingdom.
The bigger your Castle, the more you can explore the Gloom.
Place 4 Moats to form a barrier.
Buy Moats from the Nature, Water tab of the Market.
Visit 3 neighboring Kingdoms to check out their fortifications.
From your Neighbor Bar, Visit Neighbors' Kingdoms.

Welcome to CastleVille! I'm the Duke, your royal advisor and Neighbor. This Kingdom has been neglected for far too long. A new ruler is just what we need!
Your Majesty! Thank the stars you're here. A mysterious GLOOM is scaring away your SUBJECTS!
The GLOOM has spread throughout your land. Take a look for yourself!
You found SONJA's ARROWHEAD! She must be nearby...
You will need to find loyal SUBJECTS to help rebuild your KINGDOM and dispel the GLOOM.
A mighty strike! Those STARS give you EXPERIENCE (XP). Collect enough of those XP stars to LEVEL UP!
Huzzah! You have enough XP to LEVEL UP! When you LEVEL UP, you gain ENERGY to do more actions and unlock new items and abilities.
Oh no, not a GLOOM WOLF! Someone must save that poor girl!
Look at that LOOT! You should COLLECT those items. You might need them later.
Marvelous, your Highness! The GLOOM WOLF dropped one of SONJA'S ARROWHEADS. I wager she'd be HAPPY to have it back.
She tried to open the MAGICAL KEEP? No one has been able to do that since your father disappeared. Are you going to try?
You can also get more QUESTS from me. Look for the QUEST icon on the LEFT.
Royal coin purse a little light? Collecting taxes from HOUSES in your KINGDOM will get you some COINS!
That's WIZARD ALASTAIR'S satchel! Oh, thank the stars, he must be nearby!
You opened the MAGIC KEEP!? You truly are the HERO we have been waiting for! You'll make a great RULER. I would like to join your KINGDOM and aid your ADVENTURE!
You will need a strong CASTLE to dispel the GLOOM. Let's build a GREAT HALL raise your CASTLE LEVEL and find ALASTAIR!
Richard, the jester, has gone missing. He entered the gloom in search of Sonja, and no one has seen him since. Can you find him?
QUESTS are special tasks people will give you from time to time. I'll give you one to start.
The list on the LEFT will display your current QUESTS. Click the ICONS to check a QUEST's requirements and your current progress.
This QUEST has two parts. First, let's collect some STONE from these rocks.
Now we can gather WOOD from a nearby TREE by clicking it.
Well played! You completed your first QUEST. Click the ICON for your reward.
That was fun right? Look for more quests from me and others. SONJA has one too.
SONJA has joined your KINGDOM and brought some HAPPINESS with her! HAPPIER KINGDOMS provide more rewards. Your HAPPINESS is shown on the lower LEFT.
Completing QUESTS for your SUBJECTS is another way to gain HAPPINESS and increase rewards. Exclamation marks mean that QUESTS are available.
Giving GIFTs to your KINGDOM's residents also increases HAPPINESS. Beloved Rulers check back frequently to keep their people HAPPY.
DECORATIONS make the people in your KINGDOM happy. More rewards for you! Huzzah!
Excellent work! Continue growing your KINGDOM by purchasing more land.

Zounds! I knew you could open your father's KEEP! Unfortunately, it looks like the KEEP is in need of REPAIR. I've just given you a QUEST to repair it. QUESTS are special tasks people will give you from time to time.
A magnificent Great Hall, your Majesty! Now you may name your KINGDOM!
Looks like you're running low on ENERGY. You have a few ITEMS in your INVENTORY that will restore ENERGY and allow you to continue building your KINGDOM.
Should you continue to run low on ENERGY, more ENERGY ITEMS may be purchased in the MARKET.
The more farm plots you have, the more CROPS your subjects can enjoy. Empty plots may be purchased from the BUILDING tab in the Market.
Crops planted near WATER grow faster because they're irrigated! Move your Empty FARM Plots near the POND and harvest some Wheat.
COINS let you buy items and buildings. That means HAPPY subjects and a growing KINGDOM. Collect TAXES from HOUSES to earn COINS.
Now you have enough COINS to start growing your KINGDOM!
Collect MATERIALS from this building and others like it to save ENERGY.
Your residents want GRAPES! You will need to PURCHASE an EMPTY FARM PLOT from the MARKET before you can get planting.
When you plant CROPS near WATER, they become irrigated and grow FASTER!
Huzzah! You've gained enough HAPPINESS to start building your CASTLE!
Now with your KEEP built, we can start to push back The GLOOM! But first you must collect enough COINS to EXPLORE.
Excellent, you have enough COINS. Let's EXPLORE!
That's WIZARD ALASTAIR'S satchel! Oh, thank the stars, he must be nearby! Check the SATCHEL for clues.
Thank you for FREEING me! Can you also HELP me SEARCH for my lost ARROWHEAD? It's around here somewhere.
Upon my word, another GLOOM WOLF! Can you BANISH it?

Ah, but where are my manners? I'm the Duke, and I rule a neighboring Kingdom.
We've fallen on some hard times here, but I have a feeling that you can help us!
How would you like to make this Kingdom yours?

I'm afraid your new lands are surrounded by magical murk, and most of your subjects are lost in it... but don't fret! Building a Castle will allow you to dispel the Gloom and rescue your people!
You can start by saving my friend Rafael, who got lost nearby.

We haven't been properly introduced. I'm Yvette!
I was lost in the Gloom for such a long time. Now that I'm here, I'd really like to stay in your Kingdom!
Use COINS and EXPLORE here to see who this is.
Thanks for visiting {player}! You have earned some great rewards:
Your game state is out of sync with the server. Please refresh the page to continue. Error: {error}
Some improvements were just made. Refresh the game to see the latest!
You seem to have lost your magic connection. Please refresh to get more CastleVille magic.

You do not have enough energy. Would you like to buy some?

Whoa there, you need Energy! Use a potion to get more now or wait to regain 1 Energy every few minutes.
Whoa there, you need Energy! Ask Friends to send some, buy a potion or wait to regain 1 Energy every few minutes.
You need to be home to do this!
You need to visit a neighbor to do this!

Fill all the available positions to activate your building.
Recruit your Neighbors using the Recruit button or use the Buy button to have the Duke fill positions.

Fill all the available positions to activate your building.
Recruit your Neighbors using the Recruit button or use the Buy button to have the Duke fill positions.

Buildings level up as your crew members tend during visits. When the buildings level up, you get special rewards and your Castle Level increases.
Use the Thank button to send a gift to your crew. Use Remind to send a reminder to tardy crew members.

Raise your rank by tending buildings every day. As you rise in rank, you reward for tending increases.
If positions are available, you may use the Apply button to request a position.
Hire your friends to fill the open positions. Spend Crowns to have the Duke fill positions, or use Work Orders to hire your subjects.
Your {building} levels up as your crew tends the building. Earn prizes when it levels up. High level buildings provide the most Castle Levels.
Your rank is determined by how often you tend this building. Higher rank means higher bonuses.

Your Town Watch needs friends to patrol for beasties! Recruit your friends to help. Helpers can tend any tower to add arrows. Arrows are used to attack beasties that get too close to the towers!HIRE=HIRE

Watch Towers are armed with 1 arrow every 24 hours to automatically fire at any Beastie in range. Crew members can tend the tower to stock it with 3 arrows!
